name: Le Méridien Hamburg
description: Discover Le Méridien Hamburg, the Design Hotel, and discover the city in completely new ways. Situated on the banks of the Outer Alster Lake in Hamburg's trendy St. Georg district, the city center is just a short boat trip away. Stay at our family friendly hotel and choose from a variety of newly renovated guest rooms with modern designed interiors. Enjoy our on-site Heritage Restaurant and Bar and plan your next event in our meeting space with a spectacular view. Worried about leaving your pet behind? Not to worry! Our hotel is pet friendly. If you are heading to the sea why don't you just book a night or two at Le Méridien Hamburg with its perfect Alster Lake location? Our hotel is also within easy reach of the main station and attractions like Hamburg's historic districts, trade fair grounds, the harbor, the UNESCO world heritage sites Speicherstadt and Kontorhausviertel and the music halls. After a long day take a dip in our indoor pool, work out in our fitness facility or relax at our on-site spa.Marriott

name: Hotel Wedina an der Alster
description: Located in Hamburg-St. Georg, just 150 metres away from the Alster Lake, Hotel Wedina offers urban design. The individually designed rooms at the Hotel Wedina an der Alster are located in 4 colour-themed buildings (red, blue, green and yellow) and exude a love for literature. All rooms include free WiFi, wooden floors, a safe and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and a bathtub or shower. The red building contains the house library with works of over 300 contemporary writers. The blue house contains 14 authors' rooms. The green house features avant-garde architecture and books around the topic green. The yellow house houses Hamburg literature. A fresh breakfast buffet with bread from the local baker is served every morning at the hotel. Drinks and snacks are available in the "ZeitBar".Free WiFi and a selection of daily newspapers are also available. Hamburg Main Train Station is an 8-minute walk from Hotel Wedina an der Alster, and there are many theatres and museums within walking distance. Bicycles can also be hired at the hotel reception.

name: Nyx Hotel Hamburg By Leonardo Hotels
description: Located in Hamburg, 1.8 km from Hamburg Central Station, NYX Hotel Hamburg by Leonardo Hotels provides accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The accommodation features entertainment staff and a concierge service. At the hotel, every room is fitted with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All units include a safety deposit box. A continental, Full English/Irish or American breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. At NYX Hotel Hamburg by Leonardo Hotels you will find a restaurant serving international cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. A business centre and vending machines with snacks and drinks are available on site at the accommodation. Dialog im Dunkeln is 2.2 km from NYX Hotel Hamburg by Leonardo Hotels, while Mönckebergstraße is 2.5 km away. The nearest airport is Hamburg Airport, 11 km from the hotel.

name: Henri Hotel Hamburg Downtown
description: A sauna, gym and free WiFi access in the stylish lounge area are all offered by this modern hotel. Set in the heart of the city, it is a 5-minute walk from Hamburg Central Train Station. Henri Hotel Hamburg Downtown features spacious suites and studios with hand-crafted furniture and solid wooden flooring. All rooms are equipped with a large flat-screen TV and hot drinks facilities. All rooms feature an open bathroom concept with separate WC. The use of a fully equipped kitchenette in some rooms is available for a surcharge. A rich buffet breakfast and drinks are served in Henri‘s Kontor lounge area every day. The shops, bars and restaurants in Hamburg’s lively Hafencity district are only 1.5 km away. After a long day, you can relax in the sauna or work out in the gym and enjoy the scenic views of the city. Mönckebergstraße Underground Station is 90 metres from Henri Hotel Hamburg Downtown and offers excellent connections around Hamburg.

name: Hotel Rosengarten
description: Situated in Hamburg, within 13 km of Hamburg Central Station and 13 km of Hamburg Dammtor Station, Hotel Rosengarten features accommodation with a garden and free WiFi as well as free private parking for guests who drive. The property is around 14 km from Hamburg Fair, 14 km from Town Hall Hamburg and 15 km from Dialog im Dunkeln. The property is allergy-free and is located 14 km from Inner Alster Lake. At the hotel, all rooms come with a wardrobe. Rooms come with a kettle and a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer, while some rooms include a kitchenette fitted with a fridge. At Hotel Rosengarten rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. A continental, vegetarian or gluten-free breakfast is available each morning at the property. Guests at the accommodation will be able to enjoy activities in and around Hamburg, like hiking and cycling. Mönckebergstraße is 15 km from Hotel Rosengarten, while CCH-Congress Center Hamburg is 15 km from the property. The nearest airport is Hamburg Airport, 11 km from the hotel.

name: The Scotty Hotel Hamburg
description: In the heart of the vibrant St. Georg district of Hamburg, close to the city centre and a 7-minute walk from the main railway station, this hotel boasts a striking, modern design. Completely renovated, THE SCOTTY Hotel Hamburg offers modern en suite rooms with free Wi-Fi. Greet the morning with a balanced breakfast buffet. Restaurant "Trinity" offers delicious dishes in the evening and a perfectly matched wine selection. You can keep in touch via internet access provided in the hotel’s Business Lounge, and relax with a drink at the bar in the evenings. Through its central location, the hotel offers excellent connections to all of the city's sights, as well as to the motorways, railway services, the airport and exhibition grounds.

name: Hamburg Marriott Hotel
description: Situated amid legendary attractions, Hamburg Marriott Hotel is perfect for business and leisure travelers. Embrace effortless relaxation in spacious rooms and suites with luxury bedding, marble bathrooms, ergonomic workspace and high-speed Wi-Fi. Our pet friendly hotel welcomes trained pets. Discover the best of the city center from our ideal location near Reeperbahn, Miniatur Wunderland and popular shopping and dining destinations. Delight your palate with simple, time-honoured classics at our restaurant and savor creative cocktails at our lively piano bar. Host your next meeting at our business hotel. We have ample parking, hi-tech meeting spaces and superb catering, and skilled team to help you plan a successful event. Punctuate a memorable day in Germany with a refreshing swim in our indoor pool or an invigorating workout in our fitness center. With an unbeatable location near acclaimed destinations in the historic city center, Hamburg Marriott Hotel is a the perfect home base for your visit to Germany.Marriott

name: Barceló Hamburg
description: In terms of safety against viral diseases including COVID19 we have adapted our prevention and hygiene procedures to ensure the atmost safety and wellbeing of our guests staff and suppliers at all our hotels For your study and development we have constituted a Technical Commission whose aim is for us to enjoy the return to the activity with maximum safety We have created the program for this purpose We care about you which includes a sizing plan to ensure you enjoy your next stay at any of our hotels in complete tranquility. In a quiet side street close to the Inner Alster lake you will find as of March 2012 our newly built Barcelo Hamburg. An innovative and highly avantgarde style characterizes the second Barcelo Hotel in Germany. 193 B-rooms with extravagant details a Mediterranean restaurant with 124 seats as well as a modern conference and meeting area for up to 200 people complete this stylish 4* Superior Hotel. Conceived to be versatile for both business customers and those who wish to visit the city of Hamburg for holiday purposes it has numerous amenities to ensure a very pleasant stay.Barcelo.com

name: Best Western Premier Alsterkrug Hotel
description: The Best Western Premier Alsterkrug Hotel Hamburg is situated in the green area of Hamburg between the airport and city centre. This first class hotel with a high level of personal service is completely renovated. It is close to the beautiful river Alster and the Eppendorfer Fen. We are convenient to recreation, nightlife and musicals as well as several corporate locations. A number of wonderful restaurants are located just nearby. Enjoy the warm Mediterranean atmosphere everywhere in the hotel. Dine at our two restaurants or in our idyllic garden restaurant. A bar and six beautiful conference rooms which will accommodate up to 50 people are waiting for you. Tea and coffee making facilities, Wi-Fi or bellboy service are only a few of the amenities for our guests. Experience our spacious SPA on over 300 sqm; with a Finnish sauna, soft sauna and steam bath, wellness-showers and ice fountain. A large SPA lounge and a peaceful relaxation area with heated loungers finalize our new offer. The fitness area with high-quality cardio equipment from Life Fitness offers the ideal space for your daily workout. The use of all alsterSPA facilities is included in the room rate for our hotel guests. For conferences the hotel offers six conference and event rooms which accommodate up to 50 persons. Our team provides you the ideal conditions for a successful conference or event. You may also use our free of charge wireless LAN.bestwestern.com

name: the niu Yen
description: Set in Hamburg and with Hamburg Central Station reachable within 1.5 km, the niu Yen offers a tour desk, allergy-free rooms, a shared lounge, free WiFi and a bar. The property is situated 1.7 km from Dialog im Dunkeln, 1.9 km from Mönckebergstraße and 2.2 km from Inner Alster Lake. Private parking is available on site. At the hotel all rooms have air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At the niu Yen rooms include bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast. Speaking German and English, staff at the 24-hour front desk can help you plan your stay. Town Hall Hamburg is 2.3 km from the niu Yen, while Miniatur Wunderland is 2.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Hamburg Airport, 10 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel am Beatles-Platz
description: No description found

name: Lindner Hotel Am Michel
description: This 4-star hotel in central Hamburg features a spa, gym, and elegant rooms with flat-screen TVs. It is a 10-minute walk from the harbour, the Reeperbahn and public transport. Tea/coffee facilities and soundproofed windows are included in all rooms of the Lindner Hotel Am Michel. Each room features warm brown and cream tones, and an open-plan bathroom with bathrobes and slippers. International and local meals are served in the Restaurant Sonnin. Bar Lacoon serves snacks, German beer and cocktails. Beside the bar, the lobby offers 2 free internet terminals. Guests can relax in the Lindner fit & well spa. This includes a sauna and a steam room. Hotel Am Michel lies on a quiet road, just steps from restaurants and bars. A 10-minute walk away, the St Pauli and Stadthausbrücke Stations provide rail links throughout Hamburg.

name: Moxy Hamburg Altona
description: In Hamburg we say Moin! Modern design and central location make your stay, may it be for business or leisure, exceptional in every way. Located just minutes away from the train station Altona, the Moxy is the perfect starting point to discover Germany´s gateway to the world. The traditional merchant and port city embraces its rough image and entails several unique landmarks including the Hamburg Harbour which is just steps away. The famous Reeperbahn, Hamburgs vibrant hub for music and party is just around the corner and awaits with unforgettable moments. Our bright and open lobby layout is paired with contemporary furniture. The ''Plug and Meet'' gathering areas provide modern ergonomic seating, large writing walls and 56 inch televisions for presentation projection. The lobby also boasts a state-of-the art video wall and 24/7 Food & Beverage offering a wide selection of snacks and drinks.Marriott

name: Moxy Hamburg City
description: Moin. It means "Hi”, “Hello”, “Good morning”, “Good night” and everything in between, as long as it is used to greet people. That’s what Hamburg always had done: traditionally a city of merchants, globetrotters and adventurers, dockworkers and traders, Hamburg has always been a gateway to the world. Nowadays it's home to creative people from the world of media, music and fashion; a city of arts and those who make an art out of living. An ideal setting for Moxy - nested in the heart of Hamburg in between Alster and Elbe – the two iconic rivers that spread its maritime flair all over the area. When you think of Hamburg you automatically think of the harbor, rough industrial styles and on the other hand canals and romance like it was little Venice. That’s what the interior of Moxy is all about: contrasts. All the different cult districts find their way into Moxy Hamburg Mitte. From red light to beach club and from pop culture to enchanting villas – #atthemoxy catches all of it!Marriott

name: Boston Apartments Hh
description: Attractively located in the Altona-Nord district of Hamburg, Boston Apartments HH is situated 2 km from Hamburg-Altona Train Station, 2.1 km from Hamburg Fair and 1.9 km from Millerntor Stadium. The property is around 2.9 km from St. Michael's Church, 2.9 km from Hamburg Dammtor Station and 3 km from St. Pauli Piers. Free WiFi is available and private parking can be arranged at an extra charge. At the hotel, rooms come with a wardrobe. The rooms at Boston Apartments HH are fitted with a private bathroom and bed linen. Languages spoken at the reception include German and English. Port of Hamburg is 3 km from the accommodation, while CCH-Congress Center Hamburg is 3.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Hamburg Airport, 7 km from Boston Apartments HH.

name: The Cloud One Hamburg - Kontorhaus
description: Attractively situated in Hamburg, The Cloud One Hamburg-Kontorhaus features air-conditioned rooms, a terrace, free WiFi and a bar. This 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service. Private parking is available on site. At the hotel, rooms include a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Each room is equipped with a safety deposit box, while certain rooms have a balcony. Breakfast is available each morning, and includes buffet, continental and vegetarian options. Popular points of interest near The Cloud One Hamburg-Kontorhaus include Mönckebergstraße, Town Hall Hamburg and Dialog im Dunkeln. The nearest airport is Hamburg Airport, 10 km from the accommodation.

name: Holiday Inn Hamburg - Hafencity
description: "Family-friendly hotel in a vibrant new neighbourhood, with a gym and a restaurantIf you’re looking for hotels in Hamburg centre, Holiday Inn® Hamburg - HafenCity hotel is close to numerous popular city sights.HafenCity Universität U-Bahn station is next door, from where it takes 6 minutes to the Central Station and 40 minutes to Hamburg Airport (HAM). In this rapidly developing harbourside area, you're close to iconic venues such as the striking Elbphilharmonie concert hall, the historic Speicherstadt warehouse district and seafood restaurants on the Landungsbrücken pontoons. The tempting Chocoversum Chocolate Museum and delightful Miniatur Wunderland are great local attractions for families, while the renowned Hamburger Kunsthalle art museum is a short U-Bahn ride away. The hotel has 3 meeting rooms, which can host up to 200 people, and major companies such as Unilever, BP and Kühne & Nagel are within walking distance.At this hotel you can enjoy:- Inclusive Wi-Fi- 24-hour gym- Kids stay and eat freeAll Day Dining is available in our welcoming Open Lobby, where you can also meet friends or colleagues in the inviting cocktail lounge, open 24 hours, or check emails over a Starbucks coffee. Thoughtfully designed bedrooms are flooded with natural light from oversized windows, and offer a choice of pillows for a restful night.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Villa Viva Hamburg - Neueröffnung Nov 2023
description: No description found

name: Reichshof Hotel Hamburg
description: Featuring stunning designs where history and tradition meet modernity, The Reichshof Hotel Hamburg reopened in July 2015 and is located in the heart of Hamburg. Designed in Art Déco style with high ceilings and luxurious furnishings, the rooms and suites will calm you from the busy and bustling streets of Hamburg. Each room features a flat-screen TV, air conditioning and a private bathroom with an illuminated vanity mirror and a hairdryer. Free WiFi is available throughout the hotel. A complimentary bottle of water is provided in the room upon arrival. Reichshof Hotel Hamburg also features exquisite meals inspired by local gastronomy at the property's "Stadt Restaurant". Meanwhile, at EMIL's Bistro, Cafe and Bar, guests are offered an energy boosting breakfast to kick-start the morning, a delicious afternoon tea as well as snacks and aperitifs right before evening activities. The property also features a 250 m² fitness and spa area that includes 2 saunas and an exclusive relaxation lounge (for a fee). Guests can also book cosmetic treatments and massages in this modern fitness and spa area. Hamburg's main train station (170 metres away) is an ideal location to travel to many different parts of the city. The main shopping street, the Mönkebergstrasse, is 500 metres away and the museums, the Alster lake as well as Hamburg's city hall are all within a 15-minute walk away. Public parking is available for a fee.

name: Side Design Hotel Hamburg
description: This design hotel features spacious accommodation, a spa with pool, and a rooftop terrace overlooking Hamburg. It is just 2 underground stops from Hamburg Central Station and includes free WiFi. Completely renovated in 2018, rooms at the 5-star SIDE hotel feature an eco-friendly heating/cooling system. The suites offer a classic, modern design with wooden furnishings. A flat-screen satellite TV with sky channels and a bathroom are also included. An international breakfast buffet is served daily. Quality cocktails and steak meals are served in the exclusive [m]eatery bar + restaurant which were renovated in the first quarter of 2018. The SIDE Spa includes a gym, sauna and hot tub. Massages and beauty treatments can be booked. Guests can also relax in the Sky Lounge on the 8th floor, which features a minimalist design. SIDE is located in Hamburg’s Neustadt district, a 3-minute walk from the Hamburg State Opera and Gänsemarkt Underground Station. Public garage is available at the SIDE.

name: Elbbrücken Hotel
description: This hotel is peacefully and yet centrally located in a side-street in the Rothenburgsort district of Hamburg, near to the Entenwerder peninsula. Come here and make this the ideal base for your stay in Hamburg. Tuck into a delicious buffet breakfast each morning to set you up for a packed day’s sightseeing. Cyclists and hikers will appreciate the location right on the scenic Elbewanderweg route. Bikes can be stored for a fee in the underground parking garage. Enjoy the excellent public transport connections to the Alster lake and the port, with a bus taking you from the hotel to the main railway station in just 10 minutes. The hotel is also just a few hundred metres from the A255 motorway. All rooms enjoy free WiFi, a flat-screen TV and free mineral water. Public parking is available by the hotel. Underground parking at the hotel is also available subject to availability for EUR 10 per day. Reservation is required.

name: Tortue Hamburg
description: This boutique hotel is directly located in Hamburg city centre, a 1-minute walk from the Neuer Wall shopping street and a 5-minute walk from the Jungfernsteig. The TORTUE HAMBURG - Schöner als die Fantasie features 5 bars and 3 restaurants. Free WiFi is provided throughout the property. The TORTUE HAMBURG - Schöner als die Fantasie was designed by Stephen Williams and Kate Hume. The individually styled rooms and suites offer scenic views of the different courtyards. All rooms at the TORTUE HAMBURG - Schöner als die Fantasie offer a living room including a couch, a carpet or parquet, an extra-long box spring bed, a desk and a wardrobe, as well as sufficient storage space. The bright marble bathrooms with a walk-in shower or bathtub are equipped with high-quality in-house cosmetic products. With such a central location, the TORTUE HAMBURG - Schöner als die Fantasie allows direct access to some of Hamburg’s main landmarks. The Gänsemarkt, St. Michaelis Church and the Inner Alster Lake are all within a 10-minute walk while the Mönckebergstraße shopping street is an 11-minute walk away. The nearest airport is Hamburg Airport, 9 km from the property.

name: Hotel Luckys Inn
description: Situated within 600 metres of the Port of Hamburg and the St. Pauli Piers, Hotel Luckys Inn provides a shared lounge, as well as free WiFi. This property is set a short distance from the famous Reeperbahn and offers a 24-hour front desk, an ATM and ticket services for guests. At the hotel, rooms come with a desk, wardrobe, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. A buffet breakfast can be enjoyed every morning only 200 metres away. St. Michael's Church is a 15-minute walk from Hotel Luckys Inn, while the Millerntor Stadium is 1.3 km away. The nearest airport is Hamburg Airport, 12 km from the accommodation.

name: Cityhotel Monopol
description: This 3-star hotel is located directly on Hamburg's Reeperbahn nightlife mile. It offers soundproofed rooms, free Wi-Fi in the lobby, and a 24-hour cocktail bar. The City Hotel Monopol is a 3-minute walk from St. Pauli Underground Station. The Operettenhaus musical theatre is across the street. The modern rooms at the City Hotel include cable TV and an en suite bathroom with free toiletries. Free Wi-Fi access is available in the rooms. The Monopol restaurant is open for lunch and dinner. The City Hotel Monopol also offers a summer terrace and sports bar.

name: Sleephotels Suite Garde
description: Boasting a garden, Sleephotels Suite Garde offers accommodation in Hamburg, 1.7 km from Hamburg Central Station and 3.8 km from Dialog im Dunkeln. The property is situated 3.8 km from Mönckebergstraße, 3.8 km from Inner Alster Lake and 4.3 km from Town Hall Hamburg. Free WiFi is available and private parking can be arranged at an extra charge. At the hotel, rooms include a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. The rooms at Sleephotels Suite Garde are fitted with a seating area. Miniatur Wunderland is 4.6 km from the accommodation, while Hamburg Dammtor Station is 5.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Hamburg Airport, 10 km from Sleephotels Suite Garde.

name: Steigenberger Hotel Treudelberg
description: Offering a free spa, private golf facilities, and a restaurant, this luxurious hotel is situated in the Alstertal Reserve, beside the Treudelberg Golf Club. Hamburg city centre is 15 km away. The Steigenberger Hotel Treudelberg Hamburg has spacious rooms with satellite TV and an elegant bathroom. The Treudelberg Hamburg’s 27-hole championship golf course is available to all guests for an extra fee. The Country Club at the Steigenberger Treudelberg features a big sauna area, an indoor pool, and a fitness centre. Massages and beauty treatments are on offer. International cuisine is served in the Hotel Treudelberg's Bistro 19 and in the à-la-carte Restaurant Lemsahler. The large summer terrace and the Treudelbar are other highlights.

name: Novum Hotel Norddeutscher Hof Hamburg
description: Located 200 metres from Hamburg Main Train Station, this hotel offers rooms with free WiFi. It is just a 5-minute walk from the popular Spitalerstraße shopping street. All rooms at Novum Hotel Norddeutscher Hof Hamburg are classically decorated and feature an en suite bathroom with a shower. They also include cable TV and a selection of free toiletries. The hotel provides guests with an extensive breakfast buffet. There is a range of restaurants and cafes within 100 metres of the accommodation, serving both local and international cuisine. The Alster area of the city with its bridges and 2 artificial lakes is only a 5-minute walk from Novum Hotel Norddeutscher Hof Hamburg. The Port of Hamburg is the largest port in Germany and just 2 km away. Both underground U-Bahn and overground S-Bahn trains can be reached within a 5 minute walk. The A24 motorway can be reached in 10 minutes by car.

name: Baurs Park
description: Located in Hamburg’s pretty district of Blankenese, this privately-run hotel offers modern-style rooms and a terrace. It lies 500 metres from the banks of the River Elbe. Each non-smoking room at Baurs Park features a TV with cable channels and a desk. Featuring a shower, private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries. A rich breakfast buffet is available every morning at Baurs Park, while a large variety of teas is served in the hotel’s tearoom. Other facilities offered at the property include a shared lounge, a tour desk and luggage storage. The property offers free parking. The hotel is 6.7 km from O2 World Hamburg, 6.7 km from Imtech-Arena and 8.2 km from Hamburg-Altona train station. Hamburg Airport is 15 km away.

name: Hotel Atlantic Hamburg, Autograph Collection
description: The Hotel Atlantic opened in 1909 as a classic grand hotel for first-class passengers of famous luxury cruise liners. The magnificent building located on the shores of Lake Alster offers 221 rooms, including 32 suites, with timeless elegance and abundant luxury. Three restaurants ranging from casual to gourmet dining feature regional and interantional flavors while the famous Atlantic Bar excites with creative cocktails and elegant Afternoon Tea. Splendid function rooms and graceful salons provide a multi-faceted selection of stylish settings for events with up to 1,200 guests. Also amongst the jewels of this Hamburg landmark is a private cinema.Marriott

name: prizeotel Hamburg-St. Pauli
description: Set in Hamburg, 1.1 km from Port of Hamburg, prizeotel Hamburg-St.Pauli features a bar and views of the city. Featuring a shared lounge, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.4 km from St. Pauli Piers. At the hotel, the rooms have a desk and a TV. At prizeotel Hamburg-St.Pauli the rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. The accommodation offers a vegetarian or gluten-free breakfast. Languages spoken at the reception include German and English, and guests are invited to request information on the area when needed. Popular points of interest near prizeotel Hamburg-St.Pauli include Hamburg-Altona Train Station, Millerntor Stadium and St. Michael's Church. The nearest airport is Hamburg Airport, 8 km from the hotel.

name: Sleephotels Casino
description: Set in Hamburg, 600 metres from Port of Hamburg, Sleephotels Casino features rooms with city views and free WiFi. The property is around 2.3 km from Elbphilharmonie Hamburg, 2.3 km from Hamburg Fair and 2.4 km from Miniatur Wunderland. The property is allergy-free and is situated less than 1 km from St. Pauli Piers. At the hotel, the rooms are equipped with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All guest rooms at Sleephotels Casino come with a seating area. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Millerntor Stadium, St. Michael's Church and Hamburg-Altona Train Station. The nearest airport is Hamburg Airport, 9 km from Sleephotels Casino.

name: Urban Home Hotel
description: Offering free WiFi throughout the property, Urban Home Hotel is set in Hamburg, 4.4 km from Old Elbe Tunnel and 8.1 km from Dialog im Dunkeln. The property is situated 8.1 km from Miniatur Wunderland, 8.4 km from Mönckebergstraße and 8.5 km from Hamburg Central Station. St. Michael's Church is 10 km from the hotel and St. Pauli Piers is 10 km away. At the hotel, rooms are fitted with a desk and a flat-screen TV. All rooms are fitted with a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. All guest rooms feature a wardrobe. Elbphilharmonie Hamburg is 8.6 km from Urban Home Hotel, while Town Hall Hamburg is 8.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Hamburg Finkenwerder Airport, 14 km from the accommodation.

name: Prizeotel Hamburg-City
description: Prizeotel Hamburg-City offers contemporary, non-smoking rooms with free WiFi access. The hotel is located in central Hamburg. Each of the rooms at Prizeotel Hamburg-City comes equipped with a flat-screen TV, air conditioning and a docking station for smartphones. They all include a spacious private bathroom with a hairdryer. A fresh breakfast buffet is available at the accommodation each morning at an extra charge. A large variety of restaurants, cafes and bars can be found within a 5-minute walking distance of the accommodation. The popular Reeperbahn area of Hamburg is 4 km from the hotel, and the Hamburg docks are a 5-minute drive away. The spectacular Hamburg Rathaus town hall can be reached in a 20-minute walk. Private parking is available at the hotel for an additional fee, and the U Steinstraße underground station is 600 metres away.

name: Best Western Plus Hotel Böttcherhof
description: The privately run 4-star Superior Hotel Böttcherhof warmly welcomes you. In 164 comfortably and functionally furnished guest rooms, a pleasant range of services is offered starting from the business room category, such as: air conditioning, flat screen, W-LAN, laptop safe as well as a tea and coffee maker station. Our overnight guests can also make use of the spacious wellness and fitness area. This area is equipped with a bio-sauna and Finnish sauna, a steam bath, Kneipp pool as well as relaxation rooms and a fitness room with 14 Technogym machines. Massage and cosmetic treatments can also be booked for a fee. For conferences and seminars or product presentations are 20 event rooms from 19 to 200 m² available. For the physical well-being in the restaurant Johann´s in the morning an extensive breakfast buffet is offered. For lunch and dinner, regional and international dishes are served from the à la carte menu and supplemented by seasonal offers. At the hotel bar Johann´s the evening then can comfortably begin or fade away. With a good connection to the A1, exit Hamburg-Moorfleet in 4.5 kilometer distance, the conference and business hotel is conveniently located. The city centre can be reached by public transport in approximately 23 minutes. Directly in front of the hotel there is a bus stop (station: Blaue Brücke, lines 160 and 260), the next underground stop (station: Horner Rennbahn) is two kilometers away.bestwestern.com

name: Aussen Alster Hotel
description: This privately-run hotel is located 100 metres from Hamburg’s Alster lake, 10 minutes' walk from the city centre and has excellent public transport connections to the rest of the city. The Aussen Alster Hotel offers individually furnished, subtly themed en suite rooms with free wireless internet access. In the morning, enjoy the excellent breakfast buffet. In the evening, the stylish Schmilinsky restaurant serves modern, creative Italian cuisine, with an emphasis on freshness, simplicity and variety. During warmer months take dinner and breakfast in the restaurant’s idyllic little garden. The central train station (Hauptbahnhof), CCH congress centre and the trade fair grounds are all within 1.5 km of the hotel. The use of the boats and the bicycles is free of charge for guests.

name: the niu Fusion
description: A 10-minute walk from Hamburg Main Station, this design hotel in the Sankt Georg district offers free Wi-Fi, and stylish rooms with a 32-inch flat-screen TV. The the niu Fusion offers modern rooms with large and soundproofed windows. Each has an en suite bathroom with a hairdryer and towel warmer. A hot/cold breakfast buffet is available each morning. Exotic cocktails and a range of beers and wines are available in the design bar with leather sofas. The the niu Fusion is centrally located in Hamburg, just a 10-minute walk from the Mönckebergstraße shopping street and the Outer Alster Lake. Underground, S-Bahn and regional trains leave from Hamburg Main Station. Private parking is available for an extra fee.

name: The Westin Hamburg
address: Platz Der Deutschen Einheit 2, 20457 Hamburg, Hamburg
description: The Westin Hamburg Hotel offers 244 rooms and suites with floor-to-ceiling windows that mostly boast panoramic views of the city and port. Guests can expect an array of Westin services and amenities at our lifestyle hotel, including the Heavenly® Bed and Heavenly® Bath. Our hotel is dog friendly, we welcome trained pets for a EUR 40 per night at a maximum weight of 25kgs. The hotel features distinct culinary options serving both international and local cuisines. Enjoy authentic Northern German dishes in our Hanseatic Bistronomy Restaurant Fang & Feld. Overlooking the city’s HafenCity district and its waterways, on the eighth-floor, the popular bar BLICK provides a social space for guests and visitors to enjoy cocktails, a coffee at the Coffee Bar or a glass of Bubbly at the champagne bar. Spread over 1,300 square meters, the Heavenly Spa includes a Westin WORKOUT® studio, a 20-meter indoor pool, six therapy rooms, saunas, a Tea Lounge with a view on the Elbe river and a Private Spa Suite.Marriott

name: Holiday Inn Hamburg - Berliner Tor
description: The Holiday Inn Hamburg - Berliner Tor offers 316 modern air-conditioned rooms in the inner city area of Hamburg, a great starting point for sightseeing. Our hotel is also ideal for business meetings as we offer 5 meeting rooms for this purpose. The short distances to the public transport make this the ideal hotel for business and leisure travellers. If you are looking for a quiet area to do your emails and use our free Wi-Fi, or prefer a conversation with friends or colleagues, our spacious Open Lobby allows for all this in a relaxed atmosphere, while enjoying a drink or a meal anywhere, at any time. Guests who would like to keep in shape, can use our fully equipped in-house fitness 24/7.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Palais Esplanade Hamburg - Adults Only
description: Featuring a fitness centre, a restaurant as well as a bar, Palais Esplanade Hamburg - Adults Only is located in the centre of Hamburg, 1.1 km from Inner Alster Lake. The property is close to several well-known attractions, 1.9 km from Dialog im Dunkeln, 1.3 km from Mönckebergstraße and 500 metres from Hamburg Dammtor Station. The hotel features a sauna, room service and free WiFi. All units are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, fridge, a kettle, a shower, free toiletries and a desk. Featuring a private bathroom with a bath and a hairdryer, certain rooms at the hotel also offer a city view. At Palais Esplanade Hamburg - Adults Only each room includes bed linen and towels. A continental breakfast is available daily at the accommodation. With staff speaking German, English, Spanish and French, around the clock guidance is available at the reception. Popular points of interest near Palais Esplanade Hamburg - Adults Only include Hamburg Central Station, Town Hall Hamburg and Hamburg Fair. The nearest airport is Hamburg Airport, 9 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Baseler Hof
description: Right in the centre of Hamburg, situated between the Alster lake and the Planten un Blomen gardens, this hotel makes for the perfect base from which to explore Hamburg. The traditional Hotel Baseler Hof offers cosy, warmly-lit en suite rooms with wireless internet access. To start your day, enjoy the excellent breakfast buffet. In the evening, visit the hotel restaurant and wine bar Kleinhuis which offers over 40 wines and many varieties of coffees, teas and cakes. Dammtor railway station, the shopping streets and the CCH congress centre are all within walking distance. Upon arrival, you receive a 3-day ticket allowing you free travel on all public transport.

name: Leonardo Hotel Hamburg Altona
description: Set in Hamburg and with Hamburg-Altona Train Station reachable within 3.3 km, Leonardo Hotel Hamburg Altona offers express check-in and check-out, allergy-free rooms, a fitness centre, free WiFi throughout the property and a restaurant. Ideally located in the Bahrenfeld district, this hotel provides a bar. The accommodation features room service, a tour desk and luggage storage for guests. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Leonardo Hotel Hamburg Altona all rooms include bed linen and towels. A buffet, vegetarian or gluten-free breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. A business centre and vending machines with snacks and drinks are available on site at the accommodation. Speaking German, English, Spanish and Polish, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical information on the area at the reception. Volksparkstadion is 3.7 km from Leonardo Hotel Hamburg Altona, while Port of Hamburg is 4.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Hamburg Airport, 8 km from the hotel.

name: H4 Hotel Hamburg Bergedorf
description: The H4 Hamburg-Bergedorf is a modern 4 star hotel with 205 rooms and is situated in the southeast of Hamburg, in the charming borough Bergedorf. Stay in comfortable rooms in different categories. Start the day with a breakfast buffet for a nominal fee. Free Wi-Fi available throughout the hotel. 16 Modern equipped conference rooms for up to 1000 people. A banquet hall with 640 sqm. The Restaurant offers international dishes and regional sea food. Enjoy international drinks and cocktails in the typical English style bar. The hotel is easy to reach by train or car motorway A25. Parking Fee for a daily fee.Wyndham

name: Stay! Hotel Boardinghouse
description: This aparthotel is centrally located in Hamburg, just 300 metres from the Hamburg Main Station and 900 metres from the Mönckebergstraße, a popular shopping street. Free WiFi is provided in all areas of the hotel. Stay! Hotel Boardinghouse provides rooms with comfortable beds, a desk, a laptop safe and a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer. Each one also has a flat-screen TV with free SKY channels. A complimentary bottle of water is provided in your room upon arrival. Breakfast is available daily between 08:00 and 12:00. The whole accommodation is decorated with pictures by the Israeli artist, Uriel Cazes and unique wall art by Jull. Stay! Hotel Boardinghouse is 1.1 km from the Speicherstadt district and 1.2 km from the Inner Alster Lake. Hamburg Airport is only 9 km away.

name: NH Hamburg Mitte
description: In the heart of the Eimsbüttel neighborhood and minutes from Hamburg’s city center, sits the NH Hamburg Mitte hotel, completely renovated in 2017. Formerly known as NH Hamburg Norge, this hotel is fantastic for both leisure and business travelers. Guests can walk to the Zoologisches Museum Hamburg, the Reeperbahn, the swimming pool at Kaifu-Bad, the Fish Market, and the Hamburger Dom. Situated just steps away from the Christuskirche and Schlump subway stations, the hotel provides easy access to Hamburg’s city center, central train station, and other sites. NH Hamburg Mitte has 134 inviting and modern rooms. NH Sleep Better mattresses, Sky TV and free Wi-Fi greet each guest. For recreation and additional sightseeing opportunities, the hotel offers bike rental 24 hours a day. For breakfast, guests can enjoy the extensive buffet which includes fresh juices, pastries, meats, cheeses, fruit, yogurt, and made-to-order hot dishes. What the hotel lacks in on-site lunch and dinner options, it makes up for with its proximity to the bohemian Schanzenviertel district, home to trendy restaurants and thriving nightlife. The NH Hamburg Mitte’s lobby bar is perfect for pre- or post-dinner drinks and snacks, and it's open 24/7.NH Hoteles

name: Courtyard by Marriott Hamburg City
description: For the ultimate experience in comfort and convenience book your visit to the Courtyard by Marriott Hamburg City. Our modern and family friendly hotel is situated in the heart of Hamburg and has rooms that invite you to relax: showcasing free high-speed Wi-Fi access, luxurious Marriott bedding, TVs, a coffee/tea station and more. Our hotel is pet friendly and welcomes trained pets for a EUR 20 per night non-refundable fee. International dishes and high-quality service can be enjoyed at the on-site Böckmann's Restaurant or at the Bar & Lobby. We also provide a fully equipped complimentary fitness room and sauna- and relaxation area. Host your next meeting or event at our conference hotel. We have ample parking available, hi-tech meeting spaces and superb catering. Let our team help you plan your successful event. The city of Hamburg and Hamburg International Airport are easily accessible from the hotel. Make the Courtyard Hamburg City your destination of choice for your next visit to Hamburg.Marriott

name: Ökotel Hamburg
description: Located 8.9 km from Volksparkstadion, Ökotel Hamburg offers 3-star accommodation in Hamburg and features a terrace. The property is set 11 km from Hamburg Dammtor Station, 12 km from Hamburg Fair and 12 km from Hamburg-Altona Train Station. Free WiFi is available and private parking can be arranged at an extra charge. At the hotel, every room comes with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Some rooms here will provide you with a kitchenette with a fridge. All units include a wardrobe. The daily breakfast offers vegetarian, vegan or gluten-free options. Inner Alster Lake is 13 km from Ökotel Hamburg, while CCH-Congress Center Hamburg is 13 km away. The nearest airport is Hamburg Airport, 5 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel City House
description: Occupying a century-old town house, this hotel guarantees a quiet night’s sleep, while being only 10-minutes’ walk from Hamburg’s heart with its stylish shopping streets, attractions and main train station. The 4-star Hotel City House offers romantic, tastefully furnished rooms with modern amenities, including free wireless internet access. An internet terminal is also available in the lobby which is free of charge for hotel guests. The City House is just a 6-minute walk from the Lange Reihe, the liveliest street in Hamburg’s St. Georg district. Just a 10-minute walk away, lies the Mönckebergstraße shopping boulevard, which leads to Hamburg’s beautiful Rathaus (town hall) and the Alster lake. The main train station is just 600 metres away from the hotel. Here, you will find many bus lines and all U-Bahn (underground) and S-Bahn (city rail) lines, enabling you to reach all parts of the city quickly and easily.

name: The George Hotel
description: This 4-star design hotel in Hamburg offers large rooms, free Wi-Fi and a sauna and relaxation area with views of the Alster Lake. The city centre is only a 15-minute walk away. Each of the rooms at the George Hamburg includes a flat-screen TV and windows that open. The DaCaio restaurant serves fine Italian food and wines. The Bar DaCaio offers traditional British chairs and furniture as well as afternoon tea and a large selection of spirits. The AK St.Georg bus stop is directly outside the George Hamburg. Buses run to the city centre in less than 5 minutes.

name: Hotel Bellmoor im Dammtorpalais
description: Just a 5-minute walk from Dammtor railway station and Hamburg's city centre, this privately run hotel in the historic Dammtorpalais is located near the congress centre and exhibition grounds. Hotel Bellmoor im Dammtorpalais offers spacious, individually furnished rooms, with inviting colour schemes and modern amenities. Free Wi-Fi via hotspot is available in the entire hotel. Get your day off to a good start with the Bellmoor's hearty breakfast, while enjoying lovely views of Hamburg. Due to the central location of the hotel, your sightseeing can be done on foot or with convenient public transport connections. Try the international restaurants nearby, explore the nightlife venues of the famous Reeperbahn district, and admire the views of the Alster lake.

name: Renaissance Hamburg Hotel
description: With its modern design and a central location, Renaissance Hamburg Hotel encourages creativity and exploration in equal measure. You'll find us in a historic building in the heart of Hamburg, Germany, just steps away from landmarks such as Jungfernstieg, Hamburg Harbour, exclusive shopping streets, and districts. Beautiful designed rooms and suites boast superb amenities like plush bedding, TVs and high-speed internet. Our hotel is pet friendly and welcomes trained pets for a EUR 30 per night non-refundable fee. Our lifestyle hotel has established itself as one of Hamburg's top destinations for meetings and conferences, with ultra-contemporary decor, helpful facilities and services. We encourage you to experience international flavors at our on-site restaurant, or to enjoy a rewarding workout in the fitness center. You're ideally situated to discover all that Hamburg has to offer, from Reeperbahn nightlife to Alsterhaus shopping: they're all waiting for you here.Marriott

name: INNSiDE by Melia Hamburg Hafen
description: The four-star-superior INNSIDE by Melia Hamburg is a modern construction with a historical touch that disposes of 207 contemporary rooms and suites. It is situated in an excellent location next to the city center, close to the harbour city and only 2 km from Hamburg train main station with ICE connection. It is a business hotel with three meeting rooms, Restaurant and Lobby Bar, Fitness center and sauna area with modern equipment as well as underground car parking.priceline.com

name: Grand Elysee Hamburg
description: This 5-star hotel in Hamburg's Rotherbaum district offers free high-speed WiFi, 3 Restaurants, 2 bars, 1 Cafe and a luxurious spa with indoor swimming pool. The Alster Lake and Jungfernstieg shopping district are less than a 15-minute walk away. The bright and spacious rooms at Grand Elysée are elegantly furnished. All rooms are air conditioned and include a flat-screen TV, satellite sports channels, an entertainment system and a modern bathroom. Guests enjoy a spacious wellness area in the 1000 m² Elyseum Wellness & Spa with an indoor pool, saunas, one hot tube and gym. The Grand Elysée Hamburg offers European specialities in Theo's, Piazza Romana and the Brasserie Flum. Drinks and snacks are also served in the Boulevard Café, Oyster Bar and the Bourbon Street Bar, where live jazz is also played. Hamburg’s CCH Congress Centre and the Dammtor Train Station are 400 metres from the Grand Elysée Hamburg. Grand Elysée Hamburg offers a Boutique called Stilhouse Blocker with exclusive fashion.

name: Haus Rissen Gaestehaus
description: This modern hotel is quietly located next to the historic Villa Rissen, not far from Hamburg's Blankenese district with its stairs district and beautiful Elbe beaches. All rooms at Haus Rissen Gaestehaus come with boxspring beds, a desk, TV and a private bathroom with shower. The accommodation offers a continental buffet breakfast. Hamburg Fair is 15 km from Haus Rissen Gaestehaus. The nearest airport is Hamburg Airport, 21 km from the hotel.

name: Courtyard by Marriott Hamburg Airport
description: The pool is closed until further notice. The traditional country house style hotel Courtyard Marriott Hamburg Airport is located only 600 meters or 0.4 miles from Hamburg Airport, while this hotel in Hamburg is surrounded by a quiet environment. This business Hamburg hotel offers modern country charm and hospitality during your stay. The spacious guest rooms in the vicinity of Hamburg Airport are equipped with mini refrigerators, free WiFi, laptop sized safes and quadruple soundproof windows. After a restful night in our comfortable Courtyard beds, start your day with an extensive breakfast buffet starting as early as 0700 am. Discover steak and fish specialties as well as seasonal classics in our restaurant Horizon and relax in the cozy atmosphere of our bar Gate 47 with the latest cocktail creations.Marriott

name: Holiday Inn Hamburg - City Nord
description: A family hotel near Hamburg Airport with a restaurant, meeting rooms and Panorama Sauna and Fitness area on the 18th floor. Holiday Inn® Hamburg – City Nord hotel is a 10-minute walk from Rübenkamp S-bahn stop, giving direct links to the city centre. The running tracks and swimming lakes of the city’s verdant are just over the road from the hotel and family-friendly attractions including the Tierpark Hagenbeck zoo and model railway at Miniatur Wunderland are a 20-minute drive away. Business travellers have the option of 12 on-site meeting rooms with flexible space for up to 220 delegates and, if you're attending an event at Hamburg Messe und Congress exhibition centre, it’s only 20 minutes away by car. At this hotel you can enjoy: Inclusive Wi-Fi throughout, secure garage parking, a 24-hour Business Centre. Spend downtime on the 18th floor, where a Fitness Centre and sauna await with awesome city views. The Open Lobby hums with life all day, whether you come for coffee, dinner on the restaurant’s atmospheric summer terrace or craft beers at the industrial-chic. Kids stay and eat free and all guests benefit from thoughtful in-room amenities including pillow menus and Smart TV. Executive rooms offer extra refinement – some have sofa beds for families with kids.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Aspria Hamburg Uhlenhorst
description: Located in the centre of Uhlenhorst near the Alster lake and cosmopolitan downtown Hamburg, Aspria Hamburg Uhlenhorst offers a new type of hotel experience. On the site of the historic 122 year old Klipper Tennis and Hockey Club, Aspria Hamburg Uhlenhorst is a place for culture, business, sports and well-being. It's a club for people who want to get the most out of life, who want to be more in tune, mentally and physically. Enjoy full access to our club's wide range of facilities.iHotelier/iStay

name: Novotel Hamburg City Alster
description: The central location and U-Bahn station on our doorstep make the Novotel Hamburg City Alster hotel the ideal base in Hamburg. Enjoy the comfort of a 4-star hotel in the modern rooms and suites with a desk and free WIFI. Business travelers can relax in the sauna after a meeting in our modern meeting rooms, while families will love our video games area. Novo2 looks forward to welcoming you - an innovative combination of a bar lounge and eatery at your Novotel hotel.accorhotels.com

name: Crowne Plaza Hamburg - City Alster
description: The 4* Hotel Crowne Plaza ® Hamburg - City Alster is located in the center of Hamburg, directly near to the Alster lake in the popular area of St Georg / Hohenfelde. The main train station, the city center, Jungfernstieg and the Europapassage as well as the main sights of Hamburg are all located in the immediate vicinity of the hotel. The Crowne Plaza® Hamburg - City Alster presents itself completely new and in a "New Modern Design Style", measured against the demands of modern business guests. The "Work Life Rooms", offer calming accents and multi-functional space to ensure both relaxation and productivity. You can choose between Superior, Deluxe, Executive, Executive Alster and Junior Suites. All rooms are equipped with free high-speed WiFi, LCD TV, air conditioning and an iron with ironing board as well as tea and coffee making facilities. The bathrooms are equipped with hair dryers and cosmetic mirrors as well as high-quality toiletries. In addition to renovated rooms there is an innovative all-day culinary concept as well as new inspiring meeting rooms and co-working spaces. "Lifeaholics" discover with the newly established areas "The Marketplace" & "The Plaza Workspace" the perfect place to meet friends or colleagues, to work in a relaxed way or simply to linger in a pleasant ambience. The new culinary concept includes "Sushi & Steak" is served in the Crowne Plaza® Hamburg - City Alster at the All Day Bar "The Plaza" in the new hotel area "The Plaza Workspace". Popular classics are also served in this unique ambience with new refinement. A completely renovated breakfast and event restaurant "The Restaurant" awaits our guests on the 1st floor for a relaxed start to a new day or to recharge their batteries during a meeting.Official Hotel Information

name: Steigenberger Hotel Hamburg
description: Centrally located in Hamburg’s Fleetinsel area, this 5-star hotel is a 5-minute walk from Lake Alster. The Steigenberger Hotel Hamburg’s air-conditioned rooms provide scenic views of the city or canal. Each includes cable TV, a work desk and a spacious bathroom with bathrobes. WiFi is available in all areas. In the Restaurant Saal, guests can enjoy light, tempting meals and plenty of genuine Hamburg atmosphere. Sights near the Steigenberger Hamburg include the St. Michel Church and Hamburg Harbour, both just a 10-minute walk away.

name: Best Western Plus Hotel St. Raphael
description: The Best Western Plus Hotel St. Raphael is located in the heart of the city centre of Hamburg. With its first-class comfort and central location to the central station, it is a favourite with business travellers and tourists alike. The Best Western Plus Hotel St. Raphael is a pure non-smoking hotel. Just a few minutes' walk away from the hotel are the central bus station, the main shopping streets of the city centre, the Museum of Art and Trade and the ‘Schauspielhaus’. Other sights and the airport can be easily reached by public transport. Sleep well in one of our 118 comfortably furnished rooms, which are equipped with all the amenities of a 4-star hotel. In our restaurant ‘St. Raphael’ you will experience culinary delights from morning until night. In the bar you can end the day comfortably. Or you can exercise in our fitness location with various fitness equipment and a functional training area. Located on the fifth floor, it offers a magnificent view over the rooftops of Hamburg. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel. Parking is available for 10 € per day in the hotel's own parking lot. A conference room with plenty of daylight for up to 40 people is available for events of all kinds. In addition to modern conference technology, we offer attentive and cordial service as well as individual organization.bestwestern.com

name: The Rilano Hotel Hamburg
description: A terrace overlooking the River Elbe, a private pier, and a 24-hour spa are offered by this quietly located, 4-star hotel in Hamburg. The Airbus Headquarters are 1 km away. The non-smoking Rilano Hotel Hamburg has rooms with flat-screen TV, laptop safe, and free internet. Some rooms enjoy direct river views. The Rilano’s top-floor spa provides great views of the Airbus Headquarters. Facilities include a Finnish sauna and gym. Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas. Regional and international specialities are served in the Rilano’s River View restaurant. Guests can also relax in the Fusion Bar or on the summer terrace. Ferries run from the Rilano Hamburg’s pier to the St. Pauli Landing Bridges. The Old Town district is 20 km away.

name: Mövenpick Hotel Hamburg
description: The 4-star superior MOvenpick Hotel Hamburg in the former water tower in the middle of the Sternschanzenpark, offers 226 modern non-smoking rooms and suites. The hotel has a Movenpick Restaurant, which offers international, regional and Swiss cuisine. The CAVE is situated in the historical water reservoir. Our 13 conference rooms offer space for meetings, banquets and conferences for up to 200 persons. The hotel has a fitness room and a relaxing sauna area with two saunas.accorhotels.com

name: Intercityhotel Hamburg Dammtor-Messe
description: This hotel is centrally located in Hamburg. It is next door to the CHH Congress Centre and 600 metres from the Dammtor Train Station. Intercityhotel Hamburg Dammtor-Messe provides air-conditioned rooms with contemporary-style furnishings. Every room includes satellite TV, a minibar and a private bathroom with shower and hairdryer. The hotel also features a 24-hour front desk, a bar and a snack bar. Luggage storage is also available. Hamburg Airport is just 8 km from IntercityHotel Hamburg Dammtor-Messe.

name: The Madison Hotel Hamburg
description: The MADISON Hotel Hamburg is located in central Hamburg, just 200 metres from the St. Michaelis Church. It offers large studios, a stylish bar, and a restaurant serving international food. The 4-star studios and suites at the MADISON Hotel include a fully-equipped kitchenette, satellite TV and high-speed internet access. Marley’s Restaurant serves breakfast, European dishes and Asian food. Die Bar offers cocktails, fine wines and a large summer terrace.

name: Hotel Wagner im Dammtorpalais
description: Located in Hamburg, The hotel offers free Wi-Fi connection and paid on-site parking. It's a 15-minute walk from the city centre. The exhibition grounds are 700 metres away. The rooms of the Hotel Wagner im Dammtorpalais include a laptop safe, a flat-screen TV and iPod docking station. The Dammtor S-Bahn railway station lies 200 metres away from the Hotel Wagner. The hotel is just a few steps from Außenalster Lake and Hamburg's Planten und Blomen park.

name: Super 8 by Wyndham Hamburg Mitte
description: A new Super 8, 274 room hotel is built on Wikingerweg 4 in Hamburg offering visitors to the Hanseatic city an overnight stay. A flatscreen TV and underfloor heating is featured. The hotel offers a W-LAN network. A coffee shop is included. The hotel allows pets. If you would like to explore the Hanseatic city via bicycle, you can rent a bicycle at the hotel. Smartphone enthusiasts can check in or out via smartphone.Wyndham

name: Hampton by Hilton Hamburg City Centre
description: With proximity to the main Hamburg train station, our Hampton by Hilton Hamburg City Centre hotel is a smart choice for travelers. Learn about the area with historical landmark pictures spread throughout the hotel. Walk to the business district, restaurants and attractions. Unwind in your quiet room on a clean and comfy Hampton bed while watching your favorite shows on the 32-inch HDTV or catching up with emails on the free WiFi. Wake up to fresh coffee and tea made in the comfort of your own room. Enjoy our daily hot breakfast, included with your stay. A laptop-sized safe, work desk with adjustable lamp and iron and ironing board help make this room feel like home. Ask our friendly team about high chairs, rooms with a sofa bed and child-friendly breakfast options. Host an event in our unique meeting space for up to 10 people, with plenty of natural light. You and your guests will enjoy the 24-hour fitness center with a variety of cardio and weights as well as the 24-hour Lobby Bar.Hilton

name: Hotel Eggers Hamburg
description: Hotel Eggers in the quiet Rahlstedt district of Hamburg offers classically furnished rooms with free Wi-Fi. Guests have free access to a modern spa with indoor pool, sauna and fitness room. Featuring light wooden furniture and warm colour schemes, the spacious rooms at Hotel Eggers Hamburg include a walk-in wardrobe, satellite TV and a minibar. Hamburg city centre is around 11 km from Hotel Eggers Hamburg and can be reached in 30 minutes from the bus stop outside the hotel.

name: Hotel Cabo
description: Situated in Hamburg’s Altona district, this modern hotel enjoys great public transport links and is just 400 metres away from the Neue Flora musical theatre. Comfy rooms equipped with free Wi-Fi internet access and free pay-per-view TV await you at the non-smoking Cabo Hotel. You can also look forward to a tasty breakfast buffet each morning. The Cabo Hotel is just a 5-minute walk away from the Holstenstraße S-Bahn (city rail) station, providing fast and easy access to all areas of Hamburg. World-famous attractions close to the Cabo include lively Reeperbahn district and the historic harbour. Business travellers will benefit from the close proximity of the Hamburg Messe, which is just 2 kilometres away.

name: Leonardo Hotel Hamburg Stillhorn
description: A 10-minute drive from Hamburg city centre, this hotel offers large rooms, a free gym and sauna. Hamburg specialities and international cuisine are served in the evenings. The Leonardo Hotel Hamburg Stillhorn provides elegant rooms with spacious seating areas. Decorated in soft colours, they include satellite TV as well as tea and coffee facilities. Leonardo’s large hot and cold breakfast buffet features organic food. Guests will also find a 24-hour business centre with printing services here. The adjacent Heuckenlock Nature Reserve is ideal for relaxing walks. Hamburg Airport is approximately 30-45-minute drive away.

name: Hotel du Nord Alster
description: This family-run 4-star concept hotel is situated just north of Hamburg's city centre, 500 metres from the Outer Alster Lake. Free internet access is available. Its rooms are fitted with high-quality beds, design lamps and mirrors and a welcome tray. The lobby features a lounge with a fireplace. Many little cafes and boutiques are located in the vicinity of Hotel du Nord Alster - auf der Uhlenhorst. The Hamburg city centre can be reached through a 3-km-long walk along the Alster Lake. Hamburg Main Station is only an 11-minute bus journey away.

name: Mercure Hotel Hamburg am Volkspark
description: The 4-star Mercure Hotel Hamburg Volkspark is in west Hamburg near Bahrenfeld race track close to Volksparkstadion HSV and the Barclaycard Arena. It has best links to the in quarter of Altona, Derby Park, city centre, Hafencity, and A7 freeway. The hotel has 140 air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, underground car park and parking lot. There are 3 meeting rooms for events with up to 120 participants.accorhotels.com

name: Hotel Domicil Hamburg by Golden Tulip
description: This hotel lies in Hamburg city centre, between the St. Pauli and Sternschanze districts. Hotel Domicil Hamburg by Golden Tulip offers modern rooms with free WiFi. All rooms at Hotel Domicil Hamburg by Golden Tulip also include cable TV and private bathroom. A rich breakfast buffet is provided each morning at Hotel Domicil Hamburg. Free coffee are available in the lobby all day. You will find a bus stop directly opposite the hotel, while underground and S-Bahn trains are less than 10 minutes away on foot. The Theater Neue Flora is a 7-minute walk away. Hamburg Exhibition Centre and the famous Reeperbahn are a 15-minute walk away. Guests can use the Hotel Domicil's secure underground car park. Please notice that the maximum high of the car cannot be over 1.57m. The A7 motorway is a 10-minute drive away.

name: relexa hotel Bellevue
description: This hotel offers free WiFi in all areas and a 24-hour reception. It is a 2-minute walk from Lange Reihe and a 10-minute walk from Hamburg Central Station. The relexa hotel Bellevue an der Alster provides non-smoking rooms with a safe. Rooms are located in 3 different buildings, and some have great views of the Alster Lake. The Alster Charme restaurant is on the ground floor right next to the reception and offers a large breakfast buffet until 11:00 on weekdays and 12:00 at weekends. Bellevue an der Alster also has a small courtyard terrace. Lange Reihe’s many shops, bars and restaurants can be reached on foot from the relexa hotel Bellevue. The AK St Georg bus stop is a 3-minute walk away, providing quick connections to the Old Town district of Hamburg.

name: St.Joseph Hotel Hamburg - Reeperbahn St.Pauli Kiez
description: Located 700 meters from the Port of Hamburg in Hamburg, St. Joseph Hotel offers free WiFi and low-cost private parking. Look forward to the in-house bar. The rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. All rooms are fitted with a private bathroom. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. Reeperbahn is 100 metres from St. Joseph Hotel, while St. Pauli Piers is 800 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Hamburg Airport, 10 km from St. Joseph Hotel.

name: Hotel am Rothenbaum
description: This hotel in the Rotherbaum district of Hamburg offers stylish rooms with free Wi-Fi and varied breakfast buffets every day. The Rothenbaum tennis courts are 200 metres away. All of the modern rooms at Am Rothenbaum include big flat-screen TVs, iPhone docking stations and laptop safes. The Hallerstraße U-Bahn (underground) station and taxi rank are located directly opposite the Hotel am Rothenbaum. Trains run to Hamburg’s main train station in 10 minutes. The Hamburg Messe exhibition centre is a 15-minute walk away. Free public parking spaces can be found nearby.

name: Ibis Hamburg City
description: Director Carsten Woll welcomes you to the ibis budget Hamburg City. Centrally located, the hotel is in easy walking distance of Hamburg Central Station, Monckebergstrasse shopping street, the Mehr. Theater playing Harry Potter and the warehouse district with the Elbphilharmonie. Our rooms have excellent soundproofing and uniquely comfortable beds, for sweet dreams.accorhotels.com

name: Boutique 053 Hamburg Main Station
description: This hotel is opposite Hamburg's main train station. It offers free Wi-Fi and great transport links. The Boutique 053 Hamburg Main Station has brightly furnished rooms with desks and satellite TV. An Italian restaurant is located in the same building as the Boutique 053 Hamburg Main Station. The lively Mönckebergstraße shopping street is a 4-minute walk away. The Hamburg Hauptbahnhof station offers direct connections to the airport and exhibition centre.

name: Mercure Hotel Hamburg City
description: Our renovated hotel is in the heart of Hamburg: near to city center, Harry Potter Theater 800m and the main train station is 1.5 km away. The airport is 12 km away. By car you can reach us via A1 and A7, you can park in our parking lot. The S-Bahn is near. The Port of Hamburg has been the centre of the city for centuries. Thanks to good public connections, every destination in Hamburg is easy to reach.accorhotels.com

name: Hotel Vorbach
description: This family-run hotel is located right in the heart of Hamburg, in a quiet side street in the beautiful Harvestehude district. Come and stay here in the plush, spacious rooms in this beautiful 19th century villa-style building. Choose from a host of richly decorated rooms with attractive features such as corner windows, oriels and balconies. With its elegant Belle Epoque ambience, high stuccoed ceilings and Art Deco touches, the hotel is a popular choice for both business travellers and leisure guests. The hotel is within comfortable walking distance of the city centre and the trade and exhibition centre. You can get to all parts of Hamburg very conveniently by public transport from the nearby Dammtor station.

name: hood house
description: Set in Hamburg, 4.1 km from Hamburg Dammtor Station, hood house offers accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a restaurant and a bar. Located around 4.2 km from Hamburg Central Station, the hotel with free WiFi is also 4.5 km away from Inner Alster Lake. Some units at the property feature a terrace with a city view. At the hotel, the rooms include a desk and a flat-screen TV. All rooms have a coffee machine and a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries, while selected rooms also offer a kitchen fitted with a dishwasher. At hood house the rooms have bed linen and towels. A continental, Full English/Irish or vegetarian breakfast is available every morning at the property. Speaking German and English at the reception, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical information on the area. Hamburg Fair is 4.6 km from the accommodation, while Town Hall Hamburg is 5.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Hamburg Airport, 5 km from hood house.

name: Boardinghouse St.Pauli
description: Located in Hamburg and with Port of Hamburg reachable within 1.1 km, Boardinghouse St.Pauli provides concierge services, non-smoking rooms, a garden, free WiFi throughout the property and a terrace. The property is situated 1.5 km from Hamburg-Altona Train Station, 2.8 km from Elbphilharmonie Hamburg and 2.8 km from Hamburg Fair. Private parking is available on site. At the hotel, each room comes with a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. The rooms are fitted with a coffee machine, while certain rooms include a balcony and others also offer city views. Guest rooms will provide guests with a fridge. Popular points of interest near Boardinghouse St.Pauli include St. Pauli Piers, Millerntor Stadium and St. Michael's Church. The nearest airport is Hamburg Airport, 9 km from the accommodation.

name: Gastwerk Hotel Hamburg
description: This 4-star design hotel offers spacious rooms, free Wi-Fi and an in-house spa area. It is located in the Altona district of Hamburg, a 10-minute train ride from the Reeperbahn. Gastwerk Hotel Hamburg features stylish factory-style architecture. It has air-conditioned rooms with extra-long beds. Further comforts include a laptop safe, slippers and bathrobes. International food is served in the Mangold restaurant and outside on the terrace. The bright atrium bar offers German beers and fine wines. You can enjoy first-class drinks in our Mangold bar Massages and beauty treatments can also be booked at the Gastwerk Hotel Hamburg. The Gastwerk Hamburg is 200 metres from Bornkamps Weg Bus Stop, and a 9-minute walk from Bahrenfeld S-Bahn Station. Drivers are just 4 minutes from the A7 motorway.

name: Mercure Hotel Hamburg Mitte
description: The hotel is in a great location: The 4-star Mercure Hotel Hamburg Mitte is close to the Rathaus, Alster river, harbor and Schanzenviertel district, and right next to the CCH and trade fair. All 180 rooms are air conditioned and have free WIFI. The events area has five rooms and is ideal for events for up to 170 people. Traveling to the hotel by train is easy, with Dammtor train station just 547 yards (500 m) away. The airport is 7.5 miles (12 km) away. You can reach us by car via the A1, A7 or A23.accorhotels.com

name: Hotel Alster-Hof
description: This 3-star-superior hotel in Hamburg is a 2-minute walk from the Alster and CCH Exhibition Centre. The Alster-Hof offers free use of the modern fitness room and sauna. The bright and spacious rooms at the Alster-Hof Hamburg feature classic-style décor. All rooms include satellite TV, minibar and large bathroom. A full breakfast buffet is served each morning in the Alster-Hof’s elegant breakfast room. The hotel bar provides a cosy ambience in the evenings. Guests can also go jogging along the nearby Alster Lake or through the Planten un Blomen park. The Jungfernstieg shopping district and the State Opera House are a 5-minute walk away. The Stephansplatz Underground Station is a 2-minute walk from the Alster-Hof. Intercity trains stop at Dammtor Train Station, a 5-minute walk away.

name: Hotel Stella Maris
description: Located directly at Hamburg’s harbour, this hotel has a sea theme. It lies in the lively Portuguese district, a 5-minute walk from St. Michaelis Church and Landungsbrücken S-Bahn and Underground Station. The 3-star Hotel Stella Maris offers bright rooms with cable TV, free WiFi and a private bathroom. Two free internet terminals are available in the lobby. The Stella Maris also has a lounge with fireplace and a library. The Reeperbahn and the lively St Pauli district are just a 10-minute walk away. Underground and S-Bahn trains run directly to Hamburg Central Station from Landungsbrücken Station.

name: Hotel Engel
description: This 4-star hotel in the suburb of Eimsbüttel offers good transport connections, a restaurant, conference facilities and a spacious garden area. Hotel Engel is 5 km from Hamburg city centre. All rooms at Hotel Engel are decorated in a classic style and include a flat-screen TV with cable channels, as well as a minibar. They also have a hairdryer in the en suite bathroom and a desk. Served up in the hotel’s Papillon restaurant are local, as well as international dishes. An optional daily breakfast buffet is also available for an additional charge. Hotel Engel is situated 9 km away from the historic Speicherstadt and a 15-minute drive from St. Michaelis Church. Kunsthalle Hamburg art museum is 8 km away from the hotel. Hagendeel U-Bahn Underground Station is 750 metres away from the hotel, while Hamburg Airport can be reached by car in 10 minutes. Hotel Engel has its own fitness area and sauna. Hotel guests also receive a discount at a private health club, just 500 metres away.

name: Leonardo Hotel Hamburg City Nord
description: Just a 10-minute drive from Hamburg Airport, this hotel opposite the Stadtpark Gardens offers free wellness facilities, free WiFi in all areas, and an à-la-carte restaurant with conservatory. The modern rooms of the Leonardo Hotel Hamburg City Nord feature a 32-inch flat-screen TV, Sky satellite channels free of charge, black-out curtains, and a work desk. The Leonardo Hotel Hamburg City Nord's Vitalis spa area with sauna and steam room is available at no extra cost. Enjoy traditional Hamburg dishes available during the day in the Windsor Restaurant and in the evening in the Störtebeker Restaurant & Bar. The spacious summer terrace invites you to relax when the weather is good. Many cycling and jogging routes are located near the Leonardo Hotel Hamburg City Nord. The Dakarweg bus stop is in front of the Leonardo Hotel Hamburg City Nord. This provides easy access to Rübenkamp S-Bahn Train Station, which is 800 metres away, heading towards the city centre.

name: YoHo - The Young Hotel
description: Set in a late 19th-century villa, this modern hotel is located in Hamburg’s Eimsbüttel district, 25 minutes walk from the city centre. Decorated in stylish cream and grey tones, all rooms at YoHo - The Young Hotel feature contemporary interiors. A cable TV and a private bathroom with a hairdryer come as standard. The Restaurant MAZZA located in the same building serves syrian cuisine all evenings The clubs and bars in Hamburg’s lively Reeperbahn district are 1.5 km from the hotel. Schlump Underground Station is 200 metres from YoHo - The Young Hotel, and offers excellent connections around the city. The Restaurant MAZZA serves a daily Croissant breakfast per EUR 7.50 per person and can be booked upon arrival.

name: Best Western Raphael Hotel Altona
description: Welcome to the Best Western Raphael Hotel Altona - a modern and comfortable city hotel with a personal touch. Right in the centre - close to the port, theatres, musicals, shopping and sightseeing - the hotel is in the trendy Altona-Ottensen district of Hamburg. The hotel is extremely easy to reach - only 100 m from the Altona train station, only 1500 m from the Hamburg-Altona Cruise terminal - and is therefore the ideal starting point for any business or leisure trip. Cyclists are given a warm welcome! Start or finish your cycle ride in the centre of a cosmopolitan city. Our hotel is the ideal place to stop over, and also has a safe place to leave your bicycles. It is right on the Elbe Cycle Route ("Elberadweg") on the section between Lühe/Wedel and Ochsenwerder. From here it is 68 km (42 miles) to Glückstadt and on the other side of the Elbe 82 km (51 miles) to Stade or 60 km (37 miles) to Lauenburg in the other direction. Our 43 individually furnished rooms offer a homely feel and 3-star-superior comfort. There is free WiFi Internet access throughout the hotel, and a free to use Internet terminal is available in the lounge. Start your day at our lavish breakfast buffet and enjoy an evening drink at our small hotel bar. Relax in the sauna area, which is open 24 hours a day. Whether you want to go sightseeing, shopping or sample the night life, all the main sights, the best shopping streets and the lively night spots are easy to reach on foot or by S-bahn from the Best Western Raphael Hotel Altona. From the Altona train station, the S-Bahn will take you to the Jungfernstieg, museums and musicals. The Fish Market, Reeperbahn and port area all easy to reach by foot. The lively restaurants and pubs in the Altona-Ottensen district are only a few minutes away from the hotel. It's also a great place to go shopping or just stroll. We look forward to welcoming you to Best Western Raphael Hotel Altona.bestwestern.com

name: Kröger by Underdog Hotels
description: Located in the Wandsbek neighbourhood of Hamburg, Kröger by Underdog Hotels offers a bar. WiFi access is available. Renovated in 2014, these modern rooms are bright and come with a stylish design. The innovative features include black-out curtains, soundproof windows and a flat-screen TV. A continental breakfast buffet is available every morning. A bus stop is located directly in front of Kröger by Underdog Hotels, providing easy access to all of Hamburg’s sights, including Reeperbahn (9.5 km). Wandsbek Botanical Gardens are a 7-minute walk. Hamburg Central Station is 6.9 km from the hotel, and the A24 motorway is 5 minutes by car. Free parking is available on site.

name: Stadthaushotel Hamburg
description: Situated in Hamburg, 1.3 km from Hamburg-Altona Train Station, Stadthaushotel Hamburg - Inklusionshotel features accommodation with a garden, free private parking and a terrace. The property is set 2.5 km from St. Pauli Piers, 1.7 km from Millerntor Stadium and 2.7 km from St. Michael's Church. The property is allergy-free and is located 2.1 km from Port of Hamburg. At the hotel, rooms are fitted with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All rooms include a safety deposit box and free WiFi, while certain rooms are equipped with a city view. The rooms have a wardrobe. Continental and vegetarian breakfast options are available each morning at Stadthaushotel Hamburg - Inklusionshotel. Hamburg Fair is 3 km from the accommodation, while Elbphilharmonie Hamburg is 3.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Hamburg Airport, 8 km from Stadthaushotel Hamburg - Inklusionshotel.

name: Scandic Hamburg Emporio
description: Only two minutes from Norderelbe, Scandic Hamburg Emporio is centrally located in Hamburg. It also offers free Wi-Fi, a sauna and an executive floor. This modern hotel provides a coffee bar, an express check-in and check-out feature and meeting rooms. For families Scandic Hamburg Emporio offers a children's play area. The rooms are air conditioned and include tea and coffee making facilities, a desk and blackout curtains. They all have a telephone and ironing facilities. Hamburg's attractions, such as the Hamburg State Opera and Binnenalster, are within easy walking distance of Scandic. There are also a variety of popular restaurants and bars in the nearby area.Revato

name: Novum Hotel Hagemann Hamburg Hafen
description: Set on Europe’s biggest river island between the Norderelbe and Süderelbe, this family-run hotel in Hamburg's Wilhelmsburg district offers maritime-style interiors and free Wi-Fi. A varied breakfast buffet is provided from 06:30 every morning.
