Spacious, contemporary-style room with full-length, soundproofed windows and a cable TV are offered at Novum Hotel Hagemann Hamburg Hafen. All rooms have a private bathroom with hairdryer and toiletries. Veddel S-Bahn Train Station is a 15-20-minute walk or a 3 Station bus ride (5-minutes) from Novum Hotel Hagemann Hamburg Hafen. From here, Hamburg Central Station is just 3 stops away. The Lion King Musical Theatre is a 10-minute drive away. On-site private parking is possible for a fee.

name: Jufa Hotel Hamburg Hafencity
description: JUFA Hotel Hamburg HafenCity features a 4-star accommodation in the HafenCity district of Hamburg. Boasting a 24-hour front desk, this property also provides guests with a terrace. Guests can grab a bite to eat in the on-site restaurant or relax in the bar. All guest rooms in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. JUFA Hotel Hamburg HafenCity offers certain units with river views, and each room is fitted with a private bathroom. All units will provide guests with a fridge. The daily breakfast offers continental, buffet or vegetarian options. Speicherstadt is 1.3 km from the accommodation. The nearest airport is Hamburg Airport, 13 km from the property.

name: Hotel Senator Hamburg
description: Located in Hamburg’s lively St. Georg district, this privately run hotel is only a few minutes walk from the city centre, the Alster lake and the central train station. The 4-star Hotel Senator Hamburg offers comfortable, tastefully furnished rooms in an intimate atmosphere with hanseatic flair. Free wireless internet access is available in the rooms and throughout the hotel. In the morning, enjoy the Senator’s hearty breakfast buffet. After an evening’s entertainment, stop by for a nightcap in the Senator bar. The hotel’s bistro in the conservatory offers drinks and a range of light, warm dishes in a relaxed setting. From the Hotel Senator, the city centre, with its many sights and shopping opportunities, the Alster lake and the main train station, are all within walking distance. Due to the convenient public transport connections, the congress centre and exhibition centre can also be reached within about 15 minutes.

name: NH Hamburg Altona
description: Offering convenience and connectivity to Hamburg’s city center, NH Hamburg Altona is a welcome escape for the business and leisure traveler. The hotel is a relaxing walk away from the nearby Ottensen district, which teems with trendy galleries, shops and restaurants. Bornkampsweg bus station is a mere block from the hotel, and Bahrenfeld and Diebsteich S-Bahn subway stations are both within a 15-minute stroll. Using Hamburg’s extensive public transportation system, travelers enjoy easy access to the city center, St. Michaelis Church, the Rathaus (Town Hall) and Alster Lake. Public transport also links to sites outside Hamburg’s city center including Barclaycard Arena and Volksparkstadion, home of the German Bundesliga’s Hamburger SV football club. Onsite, NH Hamburg Altona offers 239 spacious, modern rooms with extra-deep mattresses, hardwood floors and free Wi-Fi. Guests can enjoy the hotel’s spa facilities, including a steam room, sauna, sun terrace, relaxation room and Thai massage available upon request. Dining options include the breakfast buffet or the hotel’s Navarra Restaurant, which offers international cuisine alongside a vast Spanish and German wine and regional beer selection. The hotel is equipped with nine meeting rooms which can host a range of gatherings or events for up 190 attendees.NH Hoteles

name: Ameron Hamburg Hotel Speicherstadt
description: Offering free use of its spa and wellness centre, sauna and fitness facilities, AMERON Hamburg Hotel Speicherstadt is located in Hamburg, featuring views of the Hafencity and historic Speicerstadt. Rooms at AMERON Hamburg Hotel Speicherstadt are bright and classically decorated. They each feature a flat-screen cable TV, views of the city, as well a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Guests can enjoy Italian cuisine in the hotel restaurant, and a relaxing drink in the bar in the evenings. There are also meeting/banquet facilities and a 24-hour front desk. The hotel is 2 km from Hamburg’s famous Reeperbahn street with nightlife and bars. The Neue Flora Theatre is 4 km away, and the Old Town is a 10-minute walk from AMERON Hamburg Hotel Speicherstadt. Hamburg Central Station can be reached in a 4-minute drive from the hotel. The nearest underground station is Überseequartier, just 350 metres away. The A255 motorway is 5 minutes away by car.

name: Lindner Park-Hotel Hagenbeck
description: This 4-star-superior hotel next to Hamburg's Hagenbeck Zoo and Aquarium offers soundproofed rooms with exotic décor, a modern spa with panoramic views, and discounted access to the zoo. The spacious rooms at the Lindner Park-Hotel Hagenbeck include a flat-screen TV and laptop safe. Wi-Fi is available in all areas. The arctic-themed Lindner fit & well area on the 5th floor includes 2 saunas, infrared sauna and a relaxation room. The fitness room offers great views of Hamburg. Creative, international cuisine is served in the Lindner Park-Hotel Hagenbeck’s Augila restaurant with show kitchen. Guests can also relax on the terrace or in the Baobab Bar & Café. The Hagenbecks Tierpark Underground Station is only 100 metres from the Lindner Park-Hotel. Trains run to the Hamburg Messe Exhibition Centre in 20 minutes.

name: Hotel Hafentor
description: Hotel Hafentor is situated conveniently in Hamburg, and features a restaurant, free WiFi and a bar. This 3-star hotel offers luggage storage space. The property is non-smoking and is set 400 metres from St. Pauli Piers. At the hotel, all rooms are fitted with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. The units will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle. A continental breakfast is available every morning at Hotel Hafentor. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Port of Hamburg, Elbphilharmonie Hamburg and Millerntor Stadium. The nearest airport is Hamburg Airport, 9 km from Hotel Hafentor.

name: Hotel Kreuzer
description: This 3-star hotel offers a free sauna, free Wi-Fi, and daily breakfast buffet. It is 2 km from Wedel town centre and business park, and 18 km west of Hamburg. The Hotel Kreuzer has spacious, soundproofed rooms with bright décor and a seating area. All rooms include a fax and modem connection. Snacks and a selection of drinks are available in the Kreuzer’s bar. A drinks machine is located in the lobby. Free parking is available at the Kreuzer. The bus stop outside the Hotel Kreuzer provides easy access to Hamburg's Jungfernstieg Station, less than a 60-minute journey away. The Hotel Kreuzer sells tickets for Hamburg's public transport network. Rissen S-Bahn (city rail) Station is 1.5 km away.

name: Hotel Alsterblick
description: This historic hotel lies at the heart of Hamburg with a view of the beautiful Außenalster lake only 15 minutes from the city’s shopping boulevards and the central train station. The boutique hotel Alsterblick offers understated luxury in its en suite rooms, with either a view of the Alster lake or the garden. Internet access is available in the rooms and public areas. Enjoy a comprehensive breakfast buffet in the historic ballroom overlooking the Alster.

name: Hotel Fürst Bismarck
description: Opposite Hamburg Central Station, this hotel is a 5-minute walk from Hamburg’s Old Quarter. Guests enjoy classic-style rooms and free local public transport for the first 3 days of their stay. (valid till 31.10.2024) The Hotel Fürst Bismarck offers individually furnished rooms, featuring a flat-screen TV with cable channels. A free bottle of mineral water is included. WiFi is provided free of charge in all rooms and public areas. Guests are welcomed with a marble lobby with 24-hour reception. The business corner with PC, internet and printer can be used for free. A rich breakfast buffet is available in the spacious restaurant each morning, including bread rolls, fresh fruits and scrambled eggs. The Deutsches Schauspielhaus Theatre is a 1-minute walk away. The popular HafenCity district is 2 km from the Fürst Bismarck.

name: Meininger Hotel Hamburg City Center
description: Just 400 metres from Hamburg Altona Train Station, this hotel offers non-smoking rooms with free Wi-Fi access, and a bar with games room. The MEININGER Hotel Hamburg City Center has rooms with a TV and private bathroom. Night lights are available in all rooms. A shared washing machine and dryer are available for a fee. Varied buffet breakfasts are prepared at the MEININGER Hamburg. Guests are welcome to use the shared kitchen during their stay. Guests can find a 24-hour reception at the hotel lobby. Guests can relax in the lounge. S-Bahn trains run from Hamburg Altona Station to the Reeperbahn nightlife area in 4 minutes. Underground parking is available at the Hamburg MEININGER on request.

name: Raphael Hotel Wälderhaus
description: This environmentally friendly hotel is situated in the Wilhelmsburg district of Hamburg, directly at the former entrance to the International Garden Show. It is set within a unique wooden building, and offers free WiFi. The stylish rooms at Raphael Hotel Wälderhaus feature light wooden interiors, and come with a flat-screen TV. A hairdryer is provided in the en suite bathroom. Organic and regional products are used to prepare the dishes served in the Wilhelms restaurant. The Wälderhaus hosts an exhibition covering themes such as the environment, as well as the effects of having a forest in Hamburg and its surrounding suburbs. The meeting rooms can be rented by guests for a fee. Wilhelmsburg S-Bahn Station is a 5-minute walk from the hotel and provides connections to the centre of Hamburg in 8-minutes.

name: Motel One Hamburg Airport
description: This modern hotel with free Wi-Fi is a 10-minute walk from Hamburg Airport. All rooms at the Motel One Hamburg Airport offer cool design, a flat-screen TV and a granite and glass bathroom. Interiors at the Motel One Hamburg Airport feature a light-blue colour scheme and artistic lighting. All rooms include air conditioning, a design armchair and private bathroom. The One Lounge is located in the lobby and features designer furniture and a bar. A full buffet breakfast is served here. The Motel One is 25 minutes from Hamburg city centre by car or train. Parking spaces are available at the hotel for an additional charge. The reception at Motel One is open 24/7. It offers a tour desk.

name: Auszeit Garni Hotel Hamburg
description: Auszeit Hotel Hamburg offers comfortable rooms just 20 km from Hamburg city centre. Free Wi-Fi internet access is available throughout the hotel. All rooms at Auszeit Hotel Hamburg are designed in classic style with a flat-screen TV. They each feature an en suite bathroom with a hairdryer and complimentary toiletries. Fischbeker Heide Nature Reserve is just 2 km from the hotel. The Altes Land marshland is 5 km away, and is regarded as central Europe's largest fruit-growing region. Mountain bikers will also find Harburger Berge 5 km from Auszeit. Within a 5-minute walk of the hotel, there are several restaurants specialising in German, Greek and Italian cuisine. Auszeit Hotel Hamburg is just 400 metres from Hamburg Neugraben S-Bahn Station, which will take you to the harbour and Reeperbahn within 30 minutes. It is a 10-minute drive to the A1 motorway.

name: Kocks Hotel Garni
description: This family-run bed & breakfast hotel is located just 800 metres from Hamburg Airport and 150m from Fuhlsbüttel Nord Underground Station. Soundproofed rooms offer free Wi-Fi. The non-smoking rooms at Kocks Hotel Garni feature modern interiors. Comforts include a TV, work desk and a private bathroom with hairdryer. A rich buffet breakfast is available from 04:00, and drinks can be bought at the 24-hour front desk. A variety of restaurants are located within 5-10 minutes’ walk of Kocks Hotel Garni. The nearby underground station connects you to the centre of Hamburg in 20 minutes. A free shuttle service to the airport can also be provided on request.

name: Motel One Hamburg - Altona
description: Offering a central location, this Hamburg hotel is just 700 metres from Diebsteich S-Bahn Train Station. The Motel One Hamburg offers a garden, contemporary interiors and free Wi-Fi. A flat-screen TV, a work desk and a private bathroom with a hairdryer feature in all air-conditioned rooms at the Motel One Hamburg - Altona. Floor-to-ceiling windows and contemporary-style furniture give these rooms a bright, modern feel. A rich breakfast buffet and a selection of snacks are served in the stylish One Lounge café, which features chic designer furniture. Drinks can be enjoyed here or on the terrace. Diebsteich Train Station offers a direct connection to Hamburg’s Harbour and the vibrant Reeperbahn. Osterstraße Metro Station (1 km) also takes you directly to the Jungfernstieg shopping street. Altona Train Station is 2 km away, providing links with most major German cities.

name: 25hours Hotel Hafencity
description: Designed as a home away from home, the cabins and all of the rooms at the 25hours Hotel Hafencity are warm and cosy. Features and materials inspired by the harbour and shipbuilding are interpreted with tongue-in cheek humour and held together with sailors yarns 25 seafarers from around the world tell real life stories of dangerous voyages, romantic encounters, violent storms, painful farewells. Anecdotal accessories and objects refer to these adventures, which are told in full in each cabins logbook.accorhotels.com

name: Hotel Zum Zeppelin Hamburg
description: This family-run hotel in the Schnelsen district of Hamburg offers free Wi-Fi, international food and wines, and free private parking. The A7 motorway is only 1 km away. Hotel zum Zeppelin offers a range of simple or higher-standard rooms. All rooms include a private bathroom. Varied breakfast buffets are on offer at the Zeppelin every day. Guests are welcome to dine in the Anno 1897 restaurant, or try international wines in the Zeppelinstube bar with big screen. The bus stop served by Metrobus 5 is just 200 metres from the Hotel zum Zeppelin. Hamburg city centre is a 25-minute drive away.

name: Pierdrei Hotel Hafencity Hamburg
description: In a prime location in Hamburg, PIERDREI Hotel HafenCity Hamburg provides a continental breakfast and free WiFi throughout the property. The property is close to several well-known attractions, 1.1 km from Elbphilharmonie Hamburg, 600 metres from Dialog im Dunkeln and 1.6 km from Hamburg Central Station. Guests can enjoy a drink at the snack bar or a meal in the restaurant. At the hotel, every room has a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All units include a safety deposit box. The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire is available at PIERDREI Hotel HafenCity Hamburg. Speaking German, English and Spanish at the reception, staff are always on hand to help. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Miniatur Wunderland, Mönckebergstraße and Town Hall Hamburg. The nearest airport is Hamburg Airport, 10 km from PIERDREI Hotel HafenCity Hamburg.

name: Hotel Heimhude
description: This hotel occupies a mid-19th century Hanseatic building, in the popular district of Harvestehude and lies close to the Alster lake, Dammtor railway station and the exhibition grounds. The stilwerk Hotel Heimhude offers warm, cosy rooms displaying a classic elegance. There is free wireless LAN available in all rooms. Just a 10-minute walk takes you to the city centre with its diverse shops and the lovely Jungfernstieg area. The hotel is close to the university campus, the congress centre and the trade fair centre. Even the city's farthest attractions can be reached quickly and comfortably due to the excellent public transport connections.

name: Fairmont Hotel Vier Jahreszeiten
description: The luxurious Hotel Vier Jahreszeiten is the epitome of a European Grand Hotel. Ever since 1897, the elegant hotel by the Inner Alster has provided guests from all over the world with charming luxury and timeless elegance in the heart of the Hanseatic city, close to several cultural and architectural sights, a number of shopping opportunities and the Hamburg Messe and Congress Centre.accorhotels.com

name: Hotel Louis C. Jacob
description: This 5-star hotel on the River Elbe offers elegant rooms with free WiFi, an impressive restaurant and a spa. Hamburg’s city centre is 20 minutes away by bus. The Hotel Louis C. Jacob is over 200 years old. All rooms and suites include wooden flooring, hand-made rugs, walk-in wardrobes and a Nespresso coffee machine. Some rooms offer great views of the River Elbe. Jacobs Restaurant provides modern cuisine with French influences and a large wine cellar. The restaurant features crystal chandeliers, wall paintings and stucco ceilings. Diners can enjoy views of the linden terrace and the River Elbe. Rental bicycles are available. Hochkamp S-Bahn Station, Jenisch Park and Hirsch Park are all about 15 minutes away on foot.

name: The Fontenay
description: The Fontenay is a 5-star hotel situated on the shore of the Alster Lake in Hamburg, within walking distance of the famous shopping area at Jungfernstieg. The city resort offers a 1,000 m² rooftop spa with an indoor/outdoor pool. Guests can enjoy meals at the Lakeside gourmet restaurant with views over the Alster Lake as well as at the Parkview all-day-dining restaurant. The innovative Fontenay Bar offers a 320° panoramic view. In-room-dining is available 24 hours a day. Every room at this hotel is air-conditioned and features free WiFi as well as floor-to-ceiling windows with beautiful views of the surroundings. Some rooms feature stunning lake views. Some rooms and suites offer a private furnished balcony, a walk-in wardrobe and a seating area. The Elbphilharmonie concert hall is 3.5 km from the property. Hamburg Airport is 8 km away.

name: Hotel Volksschule
description: Located in a former school building, the family-run Hotel Volkschule offers comfortable rooms in central Hamburg. Free WiFi internet access is available throughout the hotel. The rooms at Hotel Volkschule are designed in a modern style, featuring cable TV and an en suite bathroom. It is 5 km to Hamburg’s Old Town and the harbour area, and the famous Reeperbahn Street in the district of St Pauli can be reached with a 30-minute journey on public transport. A buffet breakfast is offered each morning, and guests are welcome to relax with a drink in the bar. Hotel Volkschule is 400 metres from Rauhes Haus Underground Train Station, and it is 4 km to Hamburg Train Station. It is a 5-minute drive to the A24 motorway, and free private parking is available at the hotel.

name: Hyperion Hotel Hamburg
description: Visit HYPERION Hamburg near Hamburg Hauptbahnhof railway station with a direct connection to Hamburg Airport, and near Hamburg Town Hall, the Port of Hamburg, and Europa Passage. Rooms have complimentary wireless, HDTV and coffee maker. Amenities include gym and business center. Attractions include Hamburg Town Hall, Port of Hamburg, Hamburg Fish Market, Tierpark Hagenbeck, Miniatur Wunderland, Planten un Blomen, Alster, Reeperbahn and Moenckebergstrasse. Businesses are Olympus, Wincor Nixdorf and Korber. Meeting space for 250 guests is available and restaurants are within driving distance. Pets welcome for a nominal fee.Wyndham

name: Clounys Hotel
description: Set 13 km from Hamburg Central Station, Clounys Hotel offers 4-star accommodation in Hamburg and has a terrace, a restaurant and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a concierge service. The property is non-smoking and is situated 13 km from Hamburg Dammtor Station. Guests at the hotel can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Clounys Hotel offers a barbecue. Inner Alster Lake is 13 km from the accommodation, while Hamburg Fair is 13 km from the property. The nearest airport is Hamburg Airport, 12 km from Clounys Hotel.

name: NH Collection Hamburg City
description: The NH Collection Hamburg City hotel, set in a quiet area of the historic St Pauli district, is a perfect option for business and leisure. This sophisticated and contemporary hotel gives guests easy access to the harbor, city center, and the Messehallen exhibition complex. Exquisite meals await you at the nearby Grosse Elbstrasse and Portugiesenviertel, or you can shop on the exclusive Jungfernstieg promenade which is a 10-minute drive away. For access to the rest of the city, hop on the train at the Feldstrasse station. There are 129 spacious rooms at NH Collection Hamburg City. Our top priority is guests’ comfort which is why rooms feature rain-effect showers, NH Collection toiletries, professional hair-dryers, pillow menus, and extra comfortable mattresses. Each room also has a Nespresso machine, so you can enjoy a freshly brewed coffee at any time of day. The breakfast is a lavish affair with a spread of hot and cold dishes, many cooked-to-order, including gluten-free options. Accompany your breakfast with freshly brewed coffees, teas, and juices. We also invite you to unwind on our garden terrace with a cocktail from our 24-hour lobby bar. Relax at our rooftop wellness area with a sauna, steam room, and terrace, or book a limo to go to and from the airport.NH Hoteles

name: Intercityhotel Hamburg Hauptbahnhof
description: This 4-star hotel offers modern rooms, an elegant restaurant and rooftop terrace with panoramic city views. It is a 2-minute drive from Hamburg Central Station, Mönckebergstraße shopping mile and the Alster canal. All rooms at the Intercity Hotel Hamburg Hauptbahnhof have satellite TV, air conditioning and soundproofed windows. Buses, S-Bahn (city rail), underground and intercity train services operate from the nearby train station. On-site parking is available. A rich breakfast buffet is available each morning at the Intercity’s restaurant, with a direct view of the main railway station and Kunsthalle Art Gallery. Guests can enjoy seasonal and regional meals or a drink at the stylish bar.

name: Arcotel Onyx Hamburg
description: This 4-star hotel enjoys a central location in Hamburg’s lively St Pauli district. It offers spacious, non-smoking accommodation with free Wi-Fi and a stylish bar. The quiet rooms at the ARCOTEL Onyx Hamburg feature sunshine yellow and white interiors and chic furniture. Comforts include a flat-screen TV, iPod docking station and a window seat. Downstairs in the Bar Wiener Café, a hearty buffet breakfast is also served each morning. Set in the trendy Reeperbahn district, popular sights such as the historic Speicherstadt and Port of Hamburg are less than 2 km away. St Pauli Underground Station is 150 metres away and provides a direct connection to Hamburg Central Train Station.

name: NH Hamburg Horner Rennbahn
description: Overlooking the Hamburg-Horn horse-racing track, the NH Hamburg Horner Rennbahn hotel provides a memorable setting, plush accommodation and easy access to Hamburg’s city center. Formerly known as NH Hamburg Horn, the hotel is a short walk from a miniature golf course, Geschichtswerkstatt Horn Museum, Bunkermuseum, and the Horner Rennbahn subway station. The station connects guests to St. Michaelis Church and the Speicherstadt warehouse district, two of the city’s most visited sites. The hotel’s 172 modern Standard and Superior rooms are practical yet comfortable and feature flat screen TVs. The NH Hamburg Horner Rennbahn’s gym includes a sauna area and guests can also hire bikes. For dining options, the Restaurant Tesoro serves Spanish and German specialties. The restaurant’s warm, bright and contemporary décor makes for a welcoming lunch or dinner spot. In the summer, meals can be taken on the adjacent outdoor terrace which offers views over the race course. The hotel’s two bars - Tesoro Bar and Rennbar - offer a selection of drinks and snacks. With 10 meeting rooms on site, the hotel can host an array of different functions. The largest banquet room has a capacity for up to 200 guests.NH Hoteles

name: Dorint Hotel Hamburg-Eppendorf
description: This 4-star hotel is located in Hamburg’s Eppendorf district, 5 km from Hamburg Airport and Hamburg city centre. The Dorint Hamburg-Eppendorf offers spacious rooms with air conditioning and flat-screen TV. The soundproofed rooms at the Dorint Hotel Hamburg-Eppendorf feature modern décor and a well-equipped bathroom with a natural stone floor. Each room includes a work desk. A full breakfast buffet and selection of international cuisine are served in the stylish EPPO restaurant. Drinks can be enjoyed in Bar Seventy-two with its open-plan layout. The Dorint Hamburg has a 24-hour reception. Guests are welcome to explore the trendy district of Eppendorf with its cafés, shopping boutiques, galleries and bars. Eppendorfer Baum Underground Station is a 12-minute walk from the Dorint Eppen. This offers a direct connection to the Landing Bridges at Hamburg Port.

name: Hotel Mittelweg
description: This hotel is an attractive villa in Hamburg’s Pöseldorf district, near the Außenalster Lake. Hotel Mittelweg features a balcony and a garden terrace. Hotel Mittelweg was built at the end of the 19th century. The spacious rooms include English-style furnishings and Wi-Fi. A rich breakfast buffet is served every morning at Hotel Mittelweg Hamburg. There are many cafés and restaurants nearby. Hamburg city centre and the CHH Exhibition Centre are a 10-minute drive from Hotel Mittelweg.

name: The Suites Rainvilleterrasse
description: Located in Hamburg, The Suites Rainvilleterrasse provides 6 accommodation with private balconies. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a terrace. The air-conditioned rooms provide a river view and come with a wardrobe and free WiFi. At the hotel, every room is equipped with a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. At The Suites Rainvilleterrasse, each room comes with a seating area. Fish Market Hamburg is 2 km from the accommodation, while Port of Hamburg is 2.5 km away. The nearest airport is Hamburg Airport, 13 km from The Suites Rainvilleterrasse.

name: Central Hotel bel étage
description: This hotel is centrally located in Hamburg, 100 metres from the Alster Lake, 150 metres from Hamburg Main Station and 500 metres from the Mönckebergstraße shopping street. Free WiFi is provided at Central Hotel bel étage. The hotel is quietly located in a 200-year-old heritage building in the heart of the Lange Reihe street in the lively St. Georg district. All rooms are equipped with a minibar, kettle, desk, ceiling fan, Smart TV and a private bathroom. Every room comes with a coffee machine and a juicer with oranges provided free of charge. Some rooms have a balcony or terrace and others also have city views. Guests can dine in the hotel's own restaurant, Restaurant Central, or there are many nearby options for restaurants and bars here in the heart of the Lange Reihe street. The CCH (Congress Center Hamburg) is 1.8 km from Central Hotel bel étage, and the hotel has its own conference room for around 15 people. Hamburg Airport is 8 km away. All of Hamburg's main attractions, theatres and museums are within walking distance of Central Hotel bel étage, and all modes of public transport can be easily reached from here as well. Public parking is available in the Baumeisterstraße parking garage within a 3-minute walk of the hotel.

name: Hotel Jeta
description: Hotel Jeta offers accommodation in Hamburg. Rooms at Hotel Jeta are stylishly furnished and include cable TV and a private bathroom with complimentary toiletries and a hairdryer. Lüneburg is 36 km from Hotel Jeta, while Stade is 37 km from the property. The nearest airport is Hamburg Airport, 19 km from the property.

name: Alt Lohbrügger Hof
description: This family-run hotel lies in the leafy Hamburg suburb, Bergedorf, only 30 minutes from Hamburg’s city centre by train and near to attractions like the Bergedorf and Reinbek castles. The elegant 4-star Alt Lohbrügger Hof offers cosy, comfortably furnished rooms with wireless internet access. All rooms are quietly located and feature country-style decor. Start the morning with the hotel’s excellent breakfast buffet. In the evening, the elegant restaurant serves guests international and regional cuisine, accompanied with wine from the extensive, international list. After dinner relax with a nightcap in the cosy bar. During the warmer months enjoy coffee and cake on the terrace. Guests can hike or cycle in the Saxon Forest, or along the River Bille hiking trail.

name: Leonardo Hotel Hamburg Elbbruecken
description: Located in Hamburg's Veddel district, this Irish-style hotel offers spacious, soundproofed rooms with a flat-screen TV and free WiFi. The hotel features a sauna and is a 12-minute walk from the Veddel S-Bahn Train station, with good bus and rail connections. All rooms at the Leonardo Hotel Hamburg Elbbrücken come with tea/coffee facilities and a private bathroom. Each room has a modern décor, cable TV and a work desk. The Leonardo Hotel Hamburg Elbbrücken has an Irish bar with Sky sports channels. The Limerick Restaurant serves a buffet breakfast as well as snacks and small meals for lunch and dinner. This hotel offers a 24-hour reception. Hamburg’s main attractions are within a 20-minute train journey from the Leonardo Hotel Hamburg Elbbrücken. The S-Bahn train station provides a direct connection to Hamburg Main Station and the A255 motorway is 100 metres away.

name: Arcotel Rubin Hamburg
description: Named after the German word for ruby and boasting a red theme throughout, the 4-star superior ARCOTEL Rubin offers free WiFi and spacious rooms with flat-screen TVs. It lies in Hamburg's lively St. Georg district, 500 metres from Hamburg Central Station. Its air-conditioned rooms include soundproofed windows, leather furnishings and cordless telephones. Guests can enjoy delicious cocktails and beers at the on site bar. The many shops and cafés of the Lange Reihe street are just 5 minutes away on foot. The Außenalster Lake is a 10-minute walk and the Reeperbahn is a 15-minutes drive by car.

name: Residence Inn by Marriott Hamburg Altona
description: Set a pace that suits you at Residence Inn Hamburg - Altona. Whether you're with us for a few days, a few weeks, or a few months, your daily routine matters. Discover a modern take on classic comforts in our studios with our prime location right at the Altona train station. Hamburgs buzzling downtown, Harbour and musicals are just minutes away. A fully equipped kitchen awaits your favorite cuisine. Complimentary grocery delivery service to fill your refrigerator and satisfy cravings. Free Internet for connecting to work and the outside world. Free hot breakfast to start mornings off right and evening social hours to end the day well. And, a fitness center for strengthening your body and soul. Relax and unwind when you want. And stay focused and productive when it's essential. At Residence Inn, we'll make sure you thrive during your stay.Marriott

name: Fraser Suites Hamburg
description: Ideally set in Hamburg, Fraser Suites Hamburg features air-conditioned rooms, a fitness centre, free WiFi and a shared lounge. Well situated in the Hamburg Altstadt district, this hotel offers a bar, as well as a sauna. The property is non-smoking and is situated 600 metres from Miniatur Wunderland. At the hotel, the rooms are fitted with a desk. Some rooms also boast a kitchen with a fridge. All rooms have a safety deposit box. A continental, vegetarian or vegan breakfast is available each morning at the property. At Fraser Suites Hamburg you will find a restaurant serving British, French and Mediterranean cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and gluten-free options can also be requested. The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire is available at this 5-star hotel. Guests can make use of the business centre or relax in the snack bar. With staff speaking Arabic, German, English and French, non-stop advice is available at the reception. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include St. Michael's Church, Town Hall Hamburg and Elbphilharmonie Hamburg. The nearest airport is Hamburg Airport, 9 km from Fraser Suites Hamburg.

name: Hotel Cockpit
description: This family-run, 3-star hotel is in the north of Hamburg, just 2 km from the airport. Soundproofed windows still assure you a good night's sleep. Free parking is available. The Hotel Cockpit offers comfortable rooms with modern amenities. Most of the rooms are non-smoking. A hearty breakfast from the buffet can be enjoyed for an additional charge. An U-Bahn (underground) station is just 500 metres from the hotel. From here, it takes just 24 minutes to reach Hamburg's city centre.

name: Privathotel Lindtner Hamburg
description: Featuring good connections to the city centre of Hamburg, the 5-star Privathotel Lindtner in the Heimfeld district of Hamburg offers individually designed rooms and suites. Free WiFi and free on-site parking are included. In addition to the sauna and the steam bath, the Lindtner Medical & Spa Beauty offers a variety of high-quality wellness and beauty treatments as well as medical therapies. The Lilium Restaurant offers fresh, imaginative cuisine while the Diele restaurant offers northern German specialities. Guests can also enjoy the on-site garden and terrace. A bottle of mineral water is complimentary on arrival. Privathotel Lindtner Hamburg is a certified green hotel. At the hotel, there is a Tesla charging station for electric vehicles.

name: Sir Nikolai Hotel
description: Situated in the Hamburg Altstadt district in Hamburg, 500 metres from HafenCity Hamburg, Sir Nikolai Hotel, part of Sircle Collection features a free WiFi throughout the property. All rooms include a TV. Certain rooms feature a seating area where you can relax. Extras include bathrobes and a hairdryer. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property and the rooms are cleaned daily. Speicherstadt is 600 metres from Sir Nikolai Hotel, part of Sircle Collection, while Mönckebergstraße is 800 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Hamburg Airport, 10 km from the property.

name: Preuß im Dammtorpalais
description: Boasting excellent transport links, this 3-star hotel in the heart of Hamburg is located in the immediate vicinity of the exhibition grounds, university, and Dammtorbahnhof railway station. The property offers a 24 hours reception. Just a short walk from the famous Planten un Blomen park, the Hotel Preuss im Dammtorpalais is set in a listed building dating from 1905. From here, you enjoy quick bus links to the city’s U-Bahn (underground) and S-Bahn (city rail) network. Hamburg’s city centre and Alster lake are 10 minutes away by public transport. Catch up on sleep in the Preuss’s individually designed, en-suite rooms. Look forward to their tasteful combination of modern furniture and antiques. The competent staff can help you choose among local restaurants and book theatre tickets. Breakfast is available and can be booked directly at arrival.

name: Hotel Panorama Harburg
description: Panorama offers spacious rooms in Hamburg Harburg's centre, just a 2-minute walk from Harburg Rathaus S-Bahn Train Station. Soundproofed rooms at the Hotel Panorama Hamburg-Harburg are spacious and equipped with satellite TV channels. There is a work desk and bathrooms with hairdryer. The in-house Brasserie Restaurant serves seasonal dishes and international favourites for lunch and dinner. The nearest S-Bahn (city rail) station lies 200 metres from the Hotel Panorama. Hamburg's City Centre, the main railway station, the harbour and the Reeperbahn are a 15-minute ride away.

name: 25hours Hotel Altes Hafenamt
description: The 25hours Hotel Altes Hafenamt is a piece of living history. Once the Office for Electricity and Harbour Construction and filled with the lasting memories of sailors from all over the world, it is now a cosy captain's home. The venerable figure of the old harbour master acts as godfather, providing inspiration to guests as they move through the house. Through the use of exciting materials and novel objects the hotel has incorporated the many historical details in a creative way.accorhotels.com

name: east Hamburg
description: This 4-star Superior design hotel in the east Hotel Hamburg of Hamburg offers a large rooftop spa and spacious rooms with free Wi-Fi. It lies in the heart of the St. Pauli district, alongside the world-famous Reeperbahn. The east Hotel Hamburg offers striking design with soothing colours, here on the historic site of the former iron foundry. The stylish rooms come with king-size beds, a laptop safe and free Sky TV. Your chic marble bathroom features a rain shower or bathtub. The wellness and sports area with saunas, a roof terrace and sports equipment for strength and endurance can be used free of charge. The restaurant overlooks the hotel courtyard. International meals and Asian specialities are served here, including sushi. You can dine in our restaurant alongside the large glass facade or by candlelight in the vaulted basement of the old iron foundry. Guests can enjoy a drink at one of the hotel’s 2 lounges or in Yakshi’s bar. St Pauli Underground Station is a 4-minute walk from the east Hotel Hamburg hotel. Trains take you directly to Hamburg Central Station and the Mönckebergstraße shopping street.

name: Hotel Commodore
description: This hotel in central Hamburg is a 3-minute walk from St. Pauli Underground Station and the Reeperbahn Nightlife Mile. Hotel Commodore offers free WiFi. The bright and spacious rooms at the Hotel Commodore Hamburg feature elegant décor. All rooms include satellite TV, a desk and a private bathroom with shower. Guests can also relax in the smokers’ lounge with leather sofas. The Millerntor Stadium is only a 5-minute walk from the Hotel Commodore. The famous Landing Bridges at Hamburg Harbour can be reached in 10 minutes. The Hamburg Exhibition Centre is a 20-minute walk away. The Commodore offers a limited number of free parking spaces. Guests also enjoy a free internet terminal in reception.

name: Hotel Imperial Hamburg
description: Situated next to the Imperial Theatre in Hamburg’s nightlife district of St. Pauli, this hotel is a short walk from the Reeperbahn boulevard, harbour, fish market, and convention centre. Just a 10-minute walk from Hamburg’s city centre, the Hotel Imperial provides bright, modern rooms with en suite facilities and wired internet access. Free Wi-Fi is available in the lounge and in some rooms. St. Pauli Underground Station lies at your doorstep, ensuring easy connections to all areas of the city. The Reeperbahn S-Bahn Train Station provides quick access to the Imtech and O2 World event arenas. Relax in the warm ambience of the hotel lounge after a busy day’s exploring. Drinks are available around the clock here.

name: Hotel Hafen Hamburg
description: A 3-minute walk from the River Elbe and the Reeperbahn, this hotel offers Hanseatic food and free Wi-Fi. Its Tower Bar provides great views of Hamburg and the harbour. Rooms at the Hotel Hafen Hamburg are split between 2 buildings. Once a residence for sailors, the old building features traditional rooms with maritime antiques. The new building’s rooms have a bright, modern style. All rooms at the Hotel Hafen Hamburg are equipped with a flat-screen TV, a safety deposit box and a hairdryer. Guests can dine in the Restaurant Port or outside on the terrace. Draught beers and cocktails are served in Willi’s Bierstube. Hotel Hafen Hamburg is within a 3-minute walk of the St. Pauli landing bridges and Landungsbrücken Station. There are direct connections to Hamburg Central Station and the old town.

name: Boston Hotel Hamburg
description: This design hotel offers spacious accommodation, parking nearby and a small spa area. It lies in Hamburg's Altona district, a 3-minute walk from Holstenstrasse S-Bahn Train Station. Free WiFi is provided throughout the property. The modern rooms and suites of the Boston Hotel HH hotel have a king-size bed and a modern bathroom. A flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a minibar and a safe are also provided. Each guest receives a free bottle of mineral water. Use of the business corner is also free. The BOSTON's restaurant serves international cuisine for lunch and dinner. The breakfast menu includes sweet and savory items, served as a buffet. The stylish BOSTON Lounge offers a variety of snacks and drinks. It features armchairs, a fireplace and a library.

name: Kleinhuis Hotel Mellingburger Schleuse
description: The family-run Mellingburger Schleuse offers elegant rooms, a daily breakfast buffet and a traditional restaurant. It is located next to the Alster River in the green Poppenbüttel district of Hamburg. Every room at the Hotel Mellingburger Schleuse has cable TV and a private bathroom. Some rooms include a terrace, and Wi-Fi can be booked in all rooms. The Alt-Mellingburger Restaurant features a bright conservatory, and serves German cuisine and game specialities. Guests can also enjoy drinks and meals on the terrace, which overlooks the Alster River. Hamburg Airport is less than 10 km away from the Mellingburger Schleuse. Hamburg city centre can be reached in around 20 minutes by car.

name: Hotel Cristobal
description: This family-run, 3-star hotel in the Winterhude district of Hamburg offers free WiFi, and rooms with an original design. The Außenalster Lake is a 5-minute walk away. All of the rooms of the Hotel Cristobal are brightly furnished and include modern bathrooms. Sights near the Hotel Cristobal include the Hamburger Stadtpark park with planetarium. This is about 2 km away. Private parking is available at the Hotel Cristobal on request.

name: Egon Hotel Hamburg City
description: Boasting a restaurant, bar and views of garden, Egon Hotel Hamburg City is set in Hamburg, 1.1 km from Port of Hamburg. With a shared lounge, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation offers an ATM, a concierge service and organising tours for guests. All guest rooms in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV with cable channels. At Egon Hotel Hamburg City the rooms come with bed linen and towels. A continental breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation. A business centre and vending machines with snacks and drinks are available on site at Egon Hotel Hamburg City. Speaking German, English, Spanish and French, staff at the reception can help you plan your stay. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Hamburg-Altona Train Station, St. Pauli Piers and Millerntor Stadium. The nearest airport is Hamburg Airport, 9 km from Egon Hotel Hamburg City.

name: Zollenspieker Fährhaus
description: This 4 star superior hotel offers exclusively furnished rooms with free Wi-Fi, a large wellness area with saunas and two restaurants. Newly opened in April 2012, Zollenspieker Fährhaus features spacious rooms with original wooden beams and modern furnishings. Comforts include a flat-screen TV, and all rooms have a delightful view of the River Elbe. You can look forward to our two restaurants. In our elegant restaurant 1252 you can enjoy fish specialities and in the Brasserie creative French cuisine. Visitors will find the Zollenspieker Nature Reserve is just a 5-minute walk from the hotel. The riverside elb garden is the ideal place to relax after a long day. On nice days in summer, many great events take place there. Hamburg city centre is 30 km from the hotel and free private parking is available on site.

name: Empire Riverside Hotel
description: Panoramic city views, free Wi-Fi, a 200m² fitness and spa area and rooms with floor-to-ceiling windows are offered at Empire Riverside Hotel, just 100 metres from Hamburg Harbour and the Reeperbahn entertainment district. The superior Empire Riverside Hotel offers stylish rooms with cable TV, and most offer great views of Hamburg. Bathrobes and toiletries are provided in the bathrooms. A Finnish sauna, Kneipp-therapy pool and a relaxation area are featured at the Riverstyle Fitness and Spa area, and there is a well-equipped gym. The elegant Waterkant restaurant serves German and international cuisine. Drinks can be enjoyed in the Bar 20up on the top floor, or beside the cosy fireplace in David’s bar. The hotel is just 750 metres from Landungsbrücken Underground and S-Bahn Train Station, providing links to all parts of Hamburg.

name: Intercityhotel Hamburg-Barmbek
description: With a stay at IntercityHotel Hamburg-Barmbek in Hamburg (Hamburg-Nord), you'll be within a 5-minute drive of City Nord and English Theatre Of Hamburg. Featured amenities include a business center, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Limited parking is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Bundt's Hotel & Gartenrestaurant
description: Idyllic gardens are offered at this hotel in the rural Finkenwerder district, a 30-minute drive west of Hamburg. Bundt's Hotel & Gartenrestaurant offers free Wi-Fi and a bowling alley. The spacious rooms at Bundt's Hotel & Gartenrestaurant feature classic décor. All rooms include cable TV, a desk and a private bathroom. A breakfast buffet is provided each morning in the spacious restaurant, which offers a view of the gardens. Northern German specialities are also served here. Other on-site activities include minigolf, table tennis, shuffleboard, boccia and darts. There is also a children’s playground. Guests enjoy free parking, and the A7 motorway is just 7 km away. The Landing Bridges in Hamburg are just a 45-minute boat trip from the nearby Finkenwerder Pier.

name: North-Hotel
description: This stylish hotel is located directly on the Reeperbahn in the heart of Hamburg’s St Pauli district. It offers free WiFi access. North-Hotel provides bright rooms decorated with contemporary furniture and decorative wall art. Each is complete with a modern bathroom featuring a hairdryer and free toiletries. Guests will find numerous shops, bars, cafés and restaurants within a 5-minute walk of North-Hotel. The St. Pauli Piers (Landungsbrücken) is 750 metres from North-Hotel. Other nearby attractions include Planten un Blomen park and the Elbe Philharmonic Hall. Hamburg Central Station is 4 km from the hotel and Hamburg International Airport is 12 km away.

name: Airport Plaza Hotel Hamburg
description: Airport Plaza Hotel Hamburg, vorher bekannt als Nordport Plaza Hotel is located in Norderstedt, 3 km from Hamburg Airport. Free WiFi is featured throughout the property. The rooms at the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a minibar, safe and working space. The private bathroom is equipped with a walk-in shower and free toiletries. A continental breakfast is available daily at the property. Restaurant blue offers international cuisine with modern creations. Guests can enjoy some drinks in the Senator Lounge, located on the 9th floor and offering stunning views of Hamburg Airport and Norderstedt city. The hotel features a shop Café MOIN!, where guests can enjoy coffee, freshly made bread rolls, a selection of take away food, Nordic delicacies or where they can buy some souvenirs.

name: Boutique Hotel Poppenbütteler Hof
description: This hotel in Poppenbüttel is located just a few steps from the Alster and the hiking trails along this river. It is 2 km from Poppenbüttel S-Bahn Train Station and 8 km from Hamburg Airport. The rooms at the Hotel Poppenbütteler Hof include satellite TV and a minibar. The bathrooms have heated floors. A rich breakfast buffet is provided daily at the Poppenbütteler Hof. Hamburg city centre can be reached in 30 minutes via a direct S-Bahn train from Poppenbüttel Station.

name: Ruby Lotti Hotel Hamburg
description: Situated in Hamburg, Ruby Lotti Hotel Hamburg offers a terrace, a 24/7 bar and free WiFi. The property is set 400 metres from St. Michael's Church. The property is close to popular attractions such as Jungfernstieg, the Inner Alster Lake and Mönckebergstraße. Guests at Ruby Lotti Hotel Hamburg can enjoy a continental breakfast. Mönckebergstraße is a 14-minute walk from the accommodation. Hamburg Airport is 9 km away.

name: Superbude Altona Paradise
description: The Superbude Hamburg Altona offers a rooftop terrace and parking. It is located in Hamburg’s Bahrenfeld district, a 12-minute train journey from Hamburg city centre. The individually designed rooms of this themed hotel include flat-screen TV, WiFi access and elegant bathrooms equipped with a hairdryer and toiletries. The Kitchenclub restaurant at the property serves a variety of dishes from international cuisines. Bahrenfeld S-Bahn Station is a 7-minute walk away, providing direct connections to Hamburg Main Station. The A7 motorway is a 2-minute drive away.

name: Hotel Wilhelm Busch
description: This hotel in Norderstedt is just a 30-minute drive from Hamburg city centre and 10 minutes from Hamburg Airport. It offers quiet rooms with a TV. The Hotel Wilhelm Busch is just 900 metres away from the Ochsenzoll Underground Station. It provides easy connections to Hamburg's main attractions. The Wilhelm Busch has en suite rooms with a modern or themed design. On Sundays and public holidays, the Wilhelm Busch’s daily breakfast is available from 08:00 until 13:00. Guests can also relax in the garden or on the terrace.

name: Kleines Hotel Heimfeld
description: Nestled in Hamburg, this vacation home brings it all within your reach. Fans of nature and the outdoors will love being 18 minutes by car from Jenischpark and 20 minutes from Inner Alster Lake. Jump into your car and make short work of the 5-minute drive to Phoenix Center or the 5-minute drive to Harburger Mountains (and enjoy the property's convenient onsite parking in the meantime). Check out other neighborhoods and see more of Hamburg by hopping on a metro at Heimfeld S-Bahn, just a short 12-minute walk away. While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including Internet and a TV, as well as towels and bed sheets. Other amenities include a hair dryer.VRBO

name: Hotel Village
description: This 3-star hotel is located close to the main railway station in the St. Georg district of Hamburg. It offers modern rooms, free Wi-Fi, and free coffee throughout the day. The Hotel Village's rooms include cable TV and free Wi-Fi. Some rooms have a bed canopy and a mirrored ceiling. Breakfast is served until late every day at the Hotel Village. Breakfast is served every day from 07:30 to 11:00. The hotel reception is open 24 hours a day. A number of car parks can be found close to the Hotel Village. There is no elevator at the property.

name: Das Gästehaus der Elb Lounge
description: Set in Hamburg and within 8.3 km of Volksparkstadion, Das Gästehaus der Elb Lounge "Self Check In" features a garden, allergy-free rooms, and free WiFi. The property is around 10 km from Port of Hamburg, 10 km from St. Pauli Piers and 11 km from Millerntor Stadium. The property is non-smoking and is situated 8.9 km from Hamburg-Altona Train Station. At the hotel, every room includes a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. The units feature a wardrobe. A continental breakfast is available every morning at Das Gästehaus der Elb Lounge "Self Check In". St. Michael's Church is 11 km from the accommodation, while Elbphilharmonie Hamburg is 12 km away. The nearest airport is Hamburg Finkenwerder Airport, 1 km from Das Gästehaus der Elb Lounge "Self Check In".

name: Hotel Und Landhaus 'Kastanie'
description: Set in a quiet, green area to the north of Hamburg, this family-run hotel offers cosy rooms and apartments with free wireless internet. Free parking is available on site. The accommodation of the charming Hotel und Landhaus Kastanie is spread between the main hotel building and its adjacent cottage. Enjoy traditional cuisine in the cosy atmosphere of the hotel restaurant. A generous breakfast buffet is available here each morning, and a welcoming bar invites you to relax at the end of the day. Central Hamburg can be reached in 40 minutes by public transport. A bus stop can be found just a short walk away from the Kastanie.

name: B&B Hotel Hamburg City-Ost
description: Set in Hamburg, 1.6 km from Hamburg Central Station, B&B Hotel Hamburg City-Ost offers air-conditioned rooms and a bar. The property is located 2.1 km from Dialog im Dunkeln, 2.4 km from Mönckebergstraße and 2.6 km from Inner Alster Lake. Free WiFi is available and private parking can be arranged at an extra charge. At the hotel, all rooms come with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. The units feature a wardrobe. Buffet and continental breakfast options are available every morning at B&B Hotel Hamburg City-Ost. Town Hall Hamburg is 2.7 km from the accommodation, while Miniatur Wunderland is 2.9 km away. The nearest airport is Hamburg Airport, 10 km from B&B Hotel Hamburg City-Ost.

name: Radisson Blu Hotel, Hamburg
description: Boasting a rooftop terrace and a Finnish sauna, Radisson Blu Hotel Hamburg is situated in Hamburg and offers modern accommodation. It provides complimentary Wi-Fi, valet parking and a ballroom. Hotel Radisson Blu Hamburg has a gym with a terrace, cardiovascular equipment and a sauna. Welcoming and professional team members are available 24 hours a day. After a day of exploring the nearby region, guests can unwind in the comfort of their air conditioned rooms. All offer tea and coffee making facilities, a private bathroom and converters/voltage adaptors. During their stay, guests can enjoy lunch and dinner at Filini Restaurant, which serves Italian specialties. In the evening, guests can wind down in the lounge bar. Guests can unwind and enjoy a beverage at the wine bar. Hamburg's attractions, including Norderelbe and Gansemarkt, are within easy walking distance of Hotel Radisson Hamburg. A number of eateries and shopping options are also near by.Revato

name: Intercityhotel Hamburg-Altona
description: This hotel is centrally located next to the Altona train station. Here at the hotel you are only a few train (S-Bahn) stops away from Hamburg’s main tourist and cultural attractions. The port and renowned Reeperbahn entertainment mile are only 2 stops away, the exhibition centre is only 3 stops away, while the Alster lake and the Jungfernstieg with its numerous shops and boutiques are only 5 stops away. The rooms are modern and friendly, and feature all necessary comforts as well as soundproofed windows. Free WiFi access is also available.

name: Ginn Hotel Hamburg Elbspeicher
description: Situated in Hamburg, 1.2 km from Port of Hamburg, GINN Hotel Hamburg Elbspeicher features accommodation with a terrace, private parking, a restaurant and a bar. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service. The property is allergy-free and is located 1.4 km from St. Pauli Piers. The rooms are fitted with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, fridge, a kettle, a shower, free toiletries and a desk. Rooms include a safety deposit box and certain rooms have city views. Guest rooms have a private bathroom, a hairdryer and bed linen. The daily breakfast offers buffet, American or vegetarian options. Hamburg-Altona Train Station is 1.6 km from the hotel, while Millerntor Stadium is 2.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Hamburg Airport, 9 km from GINN Hotel Hamburg Elbspeicher.

name: Nyce Hotel Hamburg City
description: This hotel with 24-hour reception is directly opposite Hamburg Train Station. It offers free Wi-Fi in all rooms. All rooms at the NYCE Hotel Hamburg City Center feature soundproofed windows and satellite TV. Guests can enjoy the daily breakfast buffet. The NYCE Hotel Hamburg City Center is just a 10-minute walk from the Alster lake, Hamburg’s main shopping streets and the Old Town. The St. Georg district offers many bars, restaurants and lively nightlife. The NYCE Hotel Hamburg City Center has great underground and S-Bahn (city rail) connections to all parts of Hamburg. A public garage is available at the hotel.

name: Novum Hotel City Nord
description: In a prime location in the Wandsbek district of Hamburg, Novum Hotel City Nord is set 8.1 km from Hamburg Central Station, 8.3 km from Inner Alster Lake and 8.5 km from Hamburg Dammtor Station. The property is situated 9.1 km from Hamburg Fair, 9.1 km from Town Hall Hamburg and 9.3 km from Dialog im Dunkeln. Free WiFi is available and private parking can be arranged at an extra charge. The units in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The private bathroom is equipped with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At Novum Hotel City Nord every room has bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast. A business centre and vending machines with drinks are available on site at Novum Hotel City Nord. Speaking German and English, staff are ready to help around the clock at the reception. Mönckebergstraße is 9.3 km from the hotel, while CCH-Congress Center Hamburg is 10 km away. The nearest airport is Hamburg Airport, 5 km from Novum Hotel City Nord.

name: BO Hotel Hamburg
description: Offering a fitness centre and a sauna, BO Hotel Hamburg is located in Hamburg. You can relax with a drink from the on-site bar. The contemporary rooms feature a desk, a wardrobe and a private bathroom with a bathtub or shower and a hairdryer. Breakfast is served each morning in the communal lounge, with an additional cost. The hotel also offers a 24-hour front desk. BO Hotel Hamburg is 1.8 km from Hamburg Central Station and 2.3 km from Speicherstadt district, while Hamburg Airport is 10 km away.

name: Altstadthotel Harburg
description: Partially renovated in 2015, Altstadthotel Harburg is set in the Harburg district in Hamburg, 9 km from HafenCity Hamburg. A flat-screen TV with satellite channels is available. There is luggage storage space at the property. Port of Hamburg is 9 km from Altstadthotel Harburg, while St. Pauli Piers is 9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Hamburg Airport, 19 km from the property.

name: the niu Keg
description: Boasting a bar and free WiFi, the niu Keg is situated in Hamburg. Well situated in the Wandsbek district, this hotel is located 5 km from Mönckebergstraße. The property is set 5 km from Inner Alster Lake and 6 km from Jungfernstieg. All rooms in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV and an invisible sound system. A buffet breakfast is available daily at the niu Keg. Speaking German and English at the 24-hour front desk, staff are willing to help at any time of the day. Town Hall Hamburg is 6 km from the accommodation, while HafenCity Hamburg is 6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Hamburg Airport, 9 km from the niu Keg.

name: Radisson Blu Hotel, Hamburg Airport
description: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout this 4-star hotel, which is located directly beside terminals 1 and 2 at Hamburg Airport. Radisson Blu Hotel, Hamburg Airport offers a restaurant with a summer terrace and a spa with a roof terrace. The air-conditioned rooms and suites at the Radisson Blu Hotel, Hamburg Airport include a laptop safe, a flat-screen TV, an mp3 station and free tea/coffee. Each room has soundproofed windows and are all non-smoking rooms. Guests can use the the fitness club with a sauna and a steam room. The rooftop terrace provides views of Hamburg Airport. The restaurant offers a menu with local and international specialties. The bar serves cocktails. A daily newspaper and magazines can be downloaded for free in the hotel's own app. Hamburg Airport S-Bahn Train Station is only 50 metres from the Radisson Blu Hotel. Hamburg city centre is 9 km away, and trains run to Hamburg Central Station in 25 minutes.

name: the niu Bricks
description: Situated in Hamburg and with Hamburg Fair reachable within 4.6 km, the niu Bricks features a shared lounge, non-smoking rooms, free WiFi throughout the property and a bar. The property is around 4.7 km from Hamburg Dammtor Station, 5.6 km from CCH-Congress Center Hamburg and 6 km from Inner Alster Lake. Private parking is available on site. The rooms at the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box. All rooms have a private bathroom, a hairdryer and bed linen. Guests at the niu Bricks can enjoy a vegetarian breakfast. Non-stop assistance is available at the reception, where staff speak German and English. Millerntor Stadium is 6.1 km from the accommodation, while Volksparkstadion is 6.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Hamburg Airport, 4 km from the niu Bricks.

name: Hotel Süderelbe
description: Offering free WiFi, this hotel is located in a quiet side street in the heart of the Harburg district of Hamburg. Hotel Süderelbe is just a 2-minute walk from the historic Lämmertwiete street with its restaurants, cafes and bars. Rooms at Hotel Süderelbe are attractively furnished and include a flat-screen TV, wardrobe, kettle and a bathroom with shower, toilet and hairdryer. Breakfast is available daily in the spacious and warmly furnished breakfast room, and includes continental and buffet options. The hotel is just a 2-minute walk from public transport. The motorway can be reached in 5 minutes from here.

name: Best Western Hotel Hamburg International
description: The Best Western Hotel Hamburg International is located in the Hamburg-Hamm district. With its excellent transport links and close to the city centre, the Best Western Hotel Hamburg International provides the ideal overnight accommodation for business travellers and tourists alike. The hotel has 113 rooms, all with free internet access via WiFi. There is also an internet terminal available to use in the lobby. We cater for meetings, conferences and family events. here you will find the right facilities, first-class organisation and the very best in conference technology. With first-class and personal service, we will ensure your event is a complete success. We will welcome you to our "Globus" restaurant, where you can sample culinary delights. Enjoy our great selection of local and international dishes and experience our outstanding hospitality. Our hotel bar is a great place to end the day together with friends and business partners and unwind in a maritime atmosphere. You can park your car in our car park or in our garage for an additional charge. The city centre with its many places of interest to visit is just six minutes away by underground. The "Rauhes Haus" underground station is just across the street. Please note that our bar and restaurant are currently closed. Details/information can be provided by phone or e-mail.bestwestern.com

name: Sporthotel Racket Inn
description: Set in the Hamburg suburb of Schnelsen, this hotel boasts an excellent range of sport facilities from fitness studio and indoor and outdoor tennis courts. Sporthotel Racket Inn offers cosy, smart en suite rooms with free wireless internet access and all modern amenities. Start your active day with a hearty, energising breakfast buffet. The Racket Inn also offers an extensive menu for lunch and evening meals in the restaurant. After dinner, relax with a drink at the bar. The hotel is located in the north of Hamburg, in the district of Schnelsen, with easy access to the A7 motorway. Hamburg’s city centre can be reached within 40 minutes by public transport.

name: Hotel Europäischer Hof Hamburg
description: This 4-star hotel is located directly opposite Hamburg Main Station. Built in 1925, Hotel Europäischer Hof offers classic-style rooms with soundproofing. Every room includes a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a minibar. Free Wi-Fi is available in all rooms. The Europäischer Hof Hamburg offers a range of regional and international dishes in the Paulaner Wirtshaus restaurant, which offers cosy Bavarian-style furnishings. Snacks and drinks can also be enjoyed in the bar. Guests can travel for free on Hamburg’s public transport for the first 3 days of their stay.

name: Select Hotel Tiefenthal
description: This Select Hotel Tiefenthal in Hamburg’s lively Wandsbek district is a 20-minute S-Bahn ride from Hamburg Airport and a 10-minute underground ride from the city centre. It offers bright rooms with free WiFi. Satellite TV and a private bathroom with hairdryer are included in every room at the Select Hotel Tiefenthal. Each one is decorated in warm colours. A large breakfast buffet is available each morning in the breakfast room, which features views of Wandsbeker Marktplatz square. Many restaurants and cafés can be found in the modern Quarree shopping centre beside the hotel. The Select Hotel Tiefenthal is located directly at the Wandsbek Markt Underground Station and Central Bus Station. It is a 10-minute walk from Wandsbeker Chausee S-Bahn Station.They connect you to Hamburg Central Station and the Musical Theatre.

name: Excellent Hotel Hamburg
address: Im Alten Dorfe 36 2 Etagen, 22359 Hamburg, Hamburg
description: Featuring free WiFi, Excellent Hotel Hamburg offers accommodation in Hamburg, 17 km from Hamburg Central Station and 17 km from Inner Alster Lake. The property is around 18 km from Town Hall Hamburg, 18 km from Hamburg Dammtor Station and 19 km from Hamburg Fair. The hotel has a terrace and city views, and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant or a drink at the bar. At the hotel, every room has a desk and a flat-screen TV. Rooms have a kettle and a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries, while certain rooms are fitted with a kitchen fitted with a fridge. At Excellent Hotel Hamburg every room is fitted with bed linen and towels. CCH-Congress Center Hamburg is 20 km from the accommodation, while Dialog im Dunkeln is 20 km from the property. The nearest airport is Hamburg Airport, 16 km from Excellent Hotel Hamburg.

name: Mediterran
description: Set 21 km from Dialog im Dunkeln, Mediterran offers 3-star accommodation in Hamburg and features a garden, a terrace and a restaurant. Located around 22 km from Mönckebergstraße, the hotel with free WiFi is also 22 km away from Hamburg Central Station. The property is non-smoking and is situated 22 km from Miniatur Wunderland. Elbphilharmonie Hamburg is 22 km from the hotel, while Town Hall Hamburg is 22 km away. The nearest airport is Hamburg Airport, 31 km from Mediterran.

name: Hotel Fresena im Dammtorpalais
description: This hotel in central Hamburg offers free Wi-Fi in all rooms. Hotel Fresena is near Dammtor Train Station, Hamburg's CCH Exhibition Centre and the Alster Lake. Situated on the third floor of the charming Dammtorpalais, the 3-star Hotel Fresena im Dammtorpalais offers modern rooms with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. A rich buffet breakfast is served in the Fresena's breakfast room, which features a view of the Moorweidewiese Park. Hot-air balloon take off from here during the summer. A selection of newspapers is available in public areas. The Planten und Blumen gardens are a 5-minute walk from Hotel Fresena. Hamburg's famous Gänsemarkt Market is only a 10-minute walk away.
